46 
47 class Aura;
48 //
49 // EFFECT HANDLER NOTES
50 //
51 // in aura handler there should be check for modes:
52 // AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL set
53 // AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK set
54 // AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK set - aura is recalculated or is just applied/removed - need to redo all things related to m_amount
55 // AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK - logical or of above conditions
56 // AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT - set when stats are reapplied
57 // such checks will Speedup trinity change amount/send for client operations
58 // because for change amount operation packets will not be send
59 // aura effect handlers shouldn't contain any AuraEffect or Aura object modifications
60 
61 pAuraEffectHandler AuraEffectHandler[TOTAL_AURAS] =
62 {
63  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, // 0 SPELL_AURA_NONE
64  &AuraEffect::HandleBindSight, // 1 SPELL_AURA_BIND_SIGHT
65  &AuraEffect::HandleModPossess, // 2 SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS
66  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, // 3 SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE implemented in AuraEffect::PeriodicTick
67  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraDummy, // 4 SPELL_AURA_DUMMY
68  &AuraEffect::HandleModConfuse, // 5 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE
69  &AuraEffect::HandleModCharm, // 6 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM
70  &AuraEffect::HandleModFear, // 7 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR
71  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, // 8 SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL implemented in AuraEffect::PeriodicTick
72  &AuraEffect::HandleModAttackSpeed, // 9 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKSPEED
73  &AuraEffect::HandleModThreat, // 10 SPELL_AURA_MOD_THREAT
74  &AuraEffect::HandleModTaunt, // 11 SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT
75  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraModStun, // 12 SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN
76  &AuraEffect::HandleModDamageDone, // 13 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE
77  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, // 14 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_TAKEN implemented in Unit::MeleeDamageBonus and Unit::SpellDamageBonus
78  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, // 15 SPELL_AURA_DAMAGE_SHIELD implemented in Unit::DoAttackDamage
79  &AuraEffect::HandleModStealth, // 16 SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH
80  &AuraEffect::HandleModStealthDetect, // 17 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT
81  &AuraEffect::HandleModInvisibility, // 18 SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY
82  &AuraEffect::HandleModInvisibilityDetect, // 19 SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY_DETECTION
83  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, // 20 SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH implemented in AuraEffect::PeriodicTick
84  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, // 21 SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_POWER implemented in AuraEffect::PeriodicTick

258  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //195 SPELL_AURA_MOD_TARGET_ABILITY_ABSORB_SCHOOL implemented in Unit::CalcAbsorbResist

292  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //229 SPELL_AURA_MOD_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE
293  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseHealth, //230 SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_HEALTH_2
294  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //231 SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE
295  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //232 SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_DURATION_MOD implement in Unit::CalculateSpellDuration
296  &AuraEffect::HandleUnused, //233 set model id to the one of the creature with id GetMiscValue() - clientside
297  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //234 SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_DURATION_MOD_NOT_STACK implement in Unit::CalculateSpellDuration
298  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //235 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISPEL_RESIST implement in Unit::MagicSpellHitResult

300  &AuraEffect::HandleModSpellDamagePercentFromAttackPower, //237 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_DAMAGE_OF_ATTACK_POWER implemented in Unit::SpellBaseDamageBonus
301  &AuraEffect::HandleModSpellHealingPercentFromAttackPower, //238 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_HEALING_OF_ATTACK_POWER implemented in Unit::SpellBaseHealingBonus

304  &AuraEffect::HandleForceMoveForward, //241 SPELL_AURA_FORCE_MOVE_FORWARD Forces the caster to move forward

346  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //283 SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_RECEIVED implemented in Unit::SpellHealingBonus
347  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraLinked, //284 SPELL_AURA_LINKED
348  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfArmor, //285 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_OF_ARMOR implemented in Player::UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage
349  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //286 SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_PERIODIC_CRIT implemented in AuraEffect::PeriodicTick
350  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //287 SPELL_AURA_DEFLECT_SPELLS implemented in Unit::MagicSpellHitResult and Unit::MeleeSpellHitResult
351  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //288 SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_HIT_DIRECTION implemented in Unit::MagicSpellHitResult and Unit::MeleeSpellHitResult Unit::RollMeleeOutcomeAgainst
352  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //289 SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_DURABILITY_LOSS implemented in Player::DurabilityPointsLoss
353  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraModCritPct, //290 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRIT_PCT

357  &AuraEffect::HandleModManaRegen, //294 SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_REGENERATE_POWER implemented in Player::Regenerate(Powers power), HandleModManaRegen to refresh regeneration clientside
358  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //295 0 spells in 3.3.5
359  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraSetVehicle, //296 SPELL_AURA_SET_VEHICLE_ID sets vehicle on target
360  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //297 Spirit Burst spells

365  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //302 0 spells in 3.3.5
366  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //303 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_VERSUS_AURASTATE implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonus, Unit::MeleeDamageBonus
367  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraModFakeInebriation, //304 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DRUNK
368  &AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseSpeed, //305 SPELL_AURA_MOD_MINIMUM_SPEED

371  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //308 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRIT_CHANCE_FOR_CASTER implemented in Unit::isSpellCrit, ObjectAccessor::GetUnitCriticalChance
372  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //309 0 spells in 3.3.5
373  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //310 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CREATURE_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE implemented in Spell::CalculateDamageDone
374  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //311 0 spells in 3.3.5
375  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //312 0 spells in 3.3.5
376  &AuraEffect::HandleNULL, //313 0 spells in 3.3.5
377  &AuraEffect::HandlePreventResurrection, //314 SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_RESURRECTION todo
378  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //315 SPELL_AURA_UNDERWATER_WALKING todo
379  &AuraEffect::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //316 SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE implemented in AuraEffect::CalculatePeriodic
380 };
381 
382 AuraEffect::AuraEffect(Aura* base, uint8 effIndex, int32* baseAmount, Unit* caster):
383  m_base(base), m_spellInfo(base->GetSpellInfo()),
384  m_baseAmount(baseAmount ? * baseAmount : m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].BasePoints), m_critChance(0),
385  m_oldAmount(0), m_isAuraEnabled(true), m_channelData(nullptr), m_spellmod(nullptr), m_periodicTimer(0), m_tickNumber(0), m_effIndex(effIndex),
386  m_canBeRecalculated(true), m_isPeriodic(false)
387 {
388  CalculatePeriodic(caster, true, false);
389  CalculatePeriodicData();
390 
391  m_amount = CalculateAmount(caster);
392  m_casterLevel = caster ? caster->getLevel() : 0;
393  m_applyResilience = caster && caster->CanApplyResilience();
394  m_auraGroup = sSpellMgr->GetSpellGroup(GetId());
395 
396  CalculateSpellMod();
397 
398  // Xinef: channel data structure
399  if (caster)
400  if (Spell* spell = caster->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL))
401  m_channelData = new ChannelTargetData(caster->GetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT), spell->m_targets.HasDst() ? spell->m_targets.GetDst() : nullptr);
402 }
403 
404 AuraEffect::~AuraEffect()
405 {
406  delete m_spellmod;
407  delete m_channelData;
408 }
409 
410 void AuraEffect::GetTargetList(std::list<Unit*>& targetList) const
411 {
412  Aura::ApplicationMap const& targetMap = GetBase()->GetApplicationMap();
413  // remove all targets which were not added to new list - they no longer deserve area aura
414  for (Aura::ApplicationMap::const_iterator appIter = targetMap.begin(); appIter != targetMap.end(); ++appIter)
415  {
416  if (appIter->second->HasEffect(GetEffIndex()))
417  targetList.push_back(appIter->second->GetTarget());
418  }
419 }
420 
421 void AuraEffect::GetApplicationList(std::list<AuraApplication*>& applicationList) const
422 {
423  Aura::ApplicationMap const& targetMap = GetBase()->GetApplicationMap();
424  for (Aura::ApplicationMap::const_iterator appIter = targetMap.begin(); appIter != targetMap.end(); ++appIter)
425  {
426  if (appIter->second->HasEffect(GetEffIndex()))
427  applicationList.push_back(appIter->second);
428  }
429 }
430 
431 uint32 AuraEffect::GetId() const
432 {
433  return m_spellInfo->Id;
434 }
435 
436 int32 AuraEffect::GetMiscValueB() const
437 {
438  return m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].MiscValueB;
439 }
440 
441 int32 AuraEffect::GetMiscValue() const
442 {
443  return m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].MiscValue;
444 }
445 
446 AuraType AuraEffect::GetAuraType() const
447 {
448  return (AuraType)m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].ApplyAuraName;
449 }
450 
451 int32 AuraEffect::CalculateAmount(Unit* caster)
452 {
453  int32 amount;
454  // default amount calculation
455  amount = m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].CalcValue(caster, &m_baseAmount, nullptr);
456 
457  // check item enchant aura cast
458  if (!amount && caster)
459  if (ObjectGuid itemGUID = GetBase()->GetCastItemGUID())
460  if (Player* playerCaster = caster->ToPlayer())
461  if (Item* castItem = playerCaster->GetItemByGuid(itemGUID))
462  if (castItem->GetItemSuffixFactor())
463  {
464  ItemRandomSuffixEntry const* item_rand_suffix = sItemRandomSuffixStore.LookupEntry(abs(castItem->GetItemRandomPropertyId()));
465  if (item_rand_suffix)
466  {
467  for (uint8 k = 0; k < MAX_ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_EFFECTS; k++)
468  {
469  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(item_rand_suffix->Enchantment[k]);
470  if (pEnchant)
471  {
472  for (uint8 t = 0; t < MAX_SPELL_ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_EFFECTS; t++)
473  if (pEnchant->spellid[t] == m_spellInfo->Id)
474  {
475  amount = uint32((item_rand_suffix->AllocationPct[k] * castItem->GetItemSuffixFactor()) / 10000);
476  break;
477  }
478  }
479 
480  if (amount)
481  break;
482  }
483  }
484  }
485 
486  // custom amount calculations go here
487  // xinef: normal auras
488  switch (GetAuraType())
489  {
490  // crowd control auras
491  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE:
492  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR:
493  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN:
494  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT:
495  case SPELL_AURA_TRANSFORM:
496  m_canBeRecalculated = false;
497  if (!m_spellInfo->ProcFlags || m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL)) // xinef: skip auras with proctriggerspell, they must have procflags...
498  break;
499  amount = int32(GetBase()->GetUnitOwner()->CountPctFromMaxHealth(10));
500  if (caster)
501  {
502  // Glyphs increasing damage cap
503  Unit::AuraEffectList const& overrideClassScripts = caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_OVERRIDE_CLASS_SCRIPTS);
504  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator itr = overrideClassScripts.begin(); itr != overrideClassScripts.end(); ++itr)
505  {
506  if ((*itr)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
507  {
508  // Glyph of Fear, Glyph of Frost nova and similar auras
509  if ((*itr)->GetMiscValue() == 7801)
510  {
511  AddPct(amount, (*itr)->GetAmount());
512  break;
513  }
514  }
515  }
516  }
517  break;
518  case SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_ABSORB:
519  case SPELL_AURA_MANA_SHIELD:
520  m_canBeRecalculated = false;
521  break;
522  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_DONE:
523  // Titan's Grip
524  if (!caster)
525  break;
526  if (GetId() == 49152 && caster->ToPlayer())
527  {
528  Item* item1 = caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(BASE_ATTACK);
529  Item* item2 = caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK);
530 
531  if (item1 && item2 && (item1->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_2HWEAPON || item2->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_2HWEAPON))
532  amount = -10;
533  else
534  amount = 0;
535  }
536  break;
537  default:
538  break;
539  }
540 
541  // xinef: save base amount, before calculating sp etc. Used for Unit::CastDelayedSpellWithPeriodicAmount
542  SetOldAmount(amount * GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
543  GetBase()->CallScriptEffectCalcAmountHandlers(this, amount, m_canBeRecalculated);
544 
545  // Xinef: Periodic auras
546  if (caster)
547  switch (GetAuraType())
548  {
549  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE:
550  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH:
551  // xinef: save caster depending auras, always pass 1 as stack amount, effect will be multiplicated at the end of the function by correct value!
552  if (GetBase()->GetType() == UNIT_AURA_TYPE)
553  amount = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(GetBase()->GetUnitOwner(), GetSpellInfo(), amount, DOT, GetPctMods(), 1);
554  break;
555  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
556  if (GetBase()->GetType() == UNIT_AURA_TYPE)
557  amount = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(GetBase()->GetUnitOwner(), GetSpellInfo(), amount, DOT, GetPctMods(), 1);
558  break;
559  case SPELL_AURA_DAMAGE_SHIELD:
560  if (GetBase()->GetType() == UNIT_AURA_TYPE)
561  amount = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(GetBase()->GetUnitOwner(), GetSpellInfo(), amount, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, 0.0f, 1);
562  break;
563  default:
564  break;
565  }
566 
567  amount *= GetBase()->GetStackAmount();
568  return amount;
569 }
570 
571 void AuraEffect::CalculatePeriodicData()
572 {
573  // xinef: save caster depending auras with pct mods
574  if (GetBase()->GetType() == UNIT_AURA_TYPE && GetCaster())
575  {
576  if (m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL))
577  m_pctMods = GetCaster()->SpellPctHealingModsDone(GetBase()->GetUnitOwner(), GetSpellInfo(), DOT);
578  else if (m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE) || m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH))
579  m_pctMods = GetCaster()->SpellPctDamageModsDone(GetBase()->GetUnitOwner(), GetSpellInfo(), DOT);
580  }
581 
582  if (GetCaster())
583  SetCritChance(CalcPeriodicCritChance(GetCaster(), (GetBase()->GetType() == UNIT_AURA_TYPE ? GetBase()->GetUnitOwner() : nullptr)));
584 }
585 
586 void AuraEffect::CalculatePeriodic(Unit* caster, bool create, bool load)
587 {
588  m_amplitude = m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].Amplitude;
589 
590  // prepare periodics
591  switch (GetAuraType())
592  {
593  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_POWER:
594  // 3 spells have no amplitude set
595  if (!m_amplitude)
596  m_amplitude = 1 * IN_MILLISECONDS;
597  [[fallthrough]]; // TODO: Not sure whether the fallthrough was a mistake (forgetting a break) or intended. This should be double-checked.
598  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE:
599  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
600  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH:
601  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL:
602  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_ENERGIZE:
603  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH:
604  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEALTH_FUNNEL:
605  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
606  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT:
607  case SPELL_AURA_POWER_BURN:
608  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DUMMY:
609  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE:
610  m_isPeriodic = true;
611  break;
612  default:
613  break;
614  }
615 
616  GetBase()->CallScriptEffectCalcPeriodicHandlers(this, m_isPeriodic, m_amplitude);
617 
618  if (!m_isPeriodic)
619  return;
620 
621  // Xinef: fix broken data in dbc
622  if (m_amplitude <= 0)
623  m_amplitude = 1000;
624 
625  Player* modOwner = caster ? caster->GetSpellModOwner() : nullptr;
626 
627  // Apply casting time mods
628  if (m_amplitude)
629  {
630  // Apply periodic time mod
631  if (modOwner)
632  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(GetId(), SPELLMOD_ACTIVATION_TIME, m_amplitude);
633 
634  if (caster)
635  {
636  if (caster->HasAuraTypeWithAffectMask(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE, m_spellInfo) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC))
637  m_amplitude = int32(m_amplitude * caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
638  }
639  }
640 
641  if (load) // aura loaded from db
642  {
643  m_tickNumber = m_amplitude ? GetBase()->GetDuration() / m_amplitude : 0;
644  m_periodicTimer = m_amplitude ? GetBase()->GetDuration() % m_amplitude : 0;
645  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_EXTRA_INITIAL_PERIOD))
646  ++m_tickNumber;
647  }
648  else // aura just created or reapplied
649  {
650  m_tickNumber = 0;
651  // reset periodic timer on aura create or on reapply when aura isn't dot
652  // possibly we should not reset periodic timers only when aura is triggered by proc
653  // or maybe there's a spell attribute somewhere
654  bool resetPeriodicTimer = create
655  || ((GetAuraType() != SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE) && (GetAuraType() != SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT));
656 
657  if (resetPeriodicTimer)
658  {
659  m_periodicTimer = 0;
660  // Start periodic on next tick or at aura apply
661  if (m_amplitude)
662  {
663  if (!GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_EXTRA_INITIAL_PERIOD))
664  m_periodicTimer += m_amplitude;
665  else if (caster && caster->IsTotem()) // for totems only ;d
666  {
667  m_periodicTimer = 100; // make it ALMOST instant
668  if (!GetBase()->IsPassive())
669  GetBase()->SetDuration(GetBase()->GetDuration() + 100);
670  }
671  }
672  }
673  }
674 }
675 
676 void AuraEffect::CalculateSpellMod()
677 {
678  switch (GetAuraType())
679  {
680  case SPELL_AURA_ADD_FLAT_MODIFIER:
681  case SPELL_AURA_ADD_PCT_MODIFIER:
682  if (!m_spellmod)
683  {
684  m_spellmod = new SpellModifier(GetBase());
685  m_spellmod->op = SpellModOp(GetMiscValue());
686 
687  m_spellmod->type = SpellModType(GetAuraType()); // SpellModType value == spell aura types
688  m_spellmod->spellId = GetId();
689  m_spellmod->mask = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].SpellClassMask;
690  m_spellmod->charges = GetBase()->GetCharges();
691  }
692  m_spellmod->value = GetAmount();
693  break;
694  default:
695  break;
696  }
697  GetBase()->CallScriptEffectCalcSpellModHandlers(this, m_spellmod);
698 }
699 
700 void AuraEffect::ChangeAmount(int32 newAmount, bool mark, bool onStackOrReapply)
701 {
702  // Reapply if amount change
703  uint8 handleMask = 0;
704  if (newAmount != GetAmount())
705  handleMask |= AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT;
706  if (onStackOrReapply)
707  handleMask |= AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY;
708 
709  if (!handleMask)
710  return;
711 
712  std::list<AuraApplication*> effectApplications;
713  GetApplicationList(effectApplications);
714 
715  for (std::list<AuraApplication*>::const_iterator apptItr = effectApplications.begin(); apptItr != effectApplications.end(); ++apptItr)
716  if ((*apptItr)->HasEffect(GetEffIndex()))
717  HandleEffect(*apptItr, handleMask, false);
718 
719  if (handleMask & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT)
720  {
721  if (!mark)
722  m_amount = newAmount;
723  else
724  SetAmount(newAmount);
725  CalculateSpellMod();
726  }
727 
728  for (std::list<AuraApplication*>::const_iterator apptItr = effectApplications.begin(); apptItr != effectApplications.end(); ++apptItr)
729  if ((*apptItr)->HasEffect(GetEffIndex()))
730  HandleEffect(*apptItr, handleMask, true);
731 }
732 
733 void AuraEffect::HandleEffect(AuraApplication* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply)
734 {
735  // check if call is correct, we really don't want using bitmasks here (with 1 exception)
736  ASSERT(mode == AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL
737  || mode == AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT
738  || mode == AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT
739  || mode == AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT
740  || mode == AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SKILL
741  || mode == AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY
742  || mode == (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY));
743 
744  // register/unregister effect in lists in case of real AuraEffect apply/remove
745  // registration/unregistration is done always before real effect handling (some effect handlers code is depending on this)
746  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL)
747  aurApp->GetTarget()->_RegisterAuraEffect(this, apply);
748 
749  // xinef: stacking system, force return if effect is disabled, prevents double apply / unapply
750  // xinef: placed here so above line can unregister effect from the list
751  // xinef: this condition works under assumption that effect handlers performs ALL necessery action with CHANGE_AMOUNT mode
752  // xinef: as far as i've checked, all grouped spells meet this condition
753  if (!aurApp->IsActive(GetEffIndex()))
754  return;
755 
756  // real aura apply/remove, handle modifier
757  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK)
758  ApplySpellMod(aurApp->GetTarget(), apply);
759 
760  // call scripts helping/replacing effect handlers
761  bool prevented = false;
762  if (apply)
763  prevented = GetBase()->CallScriptEffectApplyHandlers(this, const_cast<AuraApplication const*>(aurApp), (AuraEffectHandleModes)mode);
764  else
765  prevented = GetBase()->CallScriptEffectRemoveHandlers(this, const_cast<AuraApplication const*>(aurApp), (AuraEffectHandleModes)mode);
766 
767  // check if script events have removed the aura or if default effect prevention was requested
768  if ((apply && aurApp->GetRemoveMode()) || prevented)
769  return;
770 
771  (*this.*AuraEffectHandler [GetAuraType()])(aurApp, mode, apply);
772 
773  // check if script events have removed the aura or if default effect prevention was requested
774  if (apply && aurApp->GetRemoveMode())
775  return;
776 
777  // call scripts triggering additional events after apply/remove
778  if (apply)
779  GetBase()->CallScriptAfterEffectApplyHandlers(this, aurApp, (AuraEffectHandleModes)mode);
780  else
781  GetBase()->CallScriptAfterEffectRemoveHandlers(this, aurApp, (AuraEffectHandleModes)mode);
782 }
783 
784 void AuraEffect::HandleEffect(Unit* target, uint8 mode, bool apply)
785 {
786  AuraApplication* aurApp = GetBase()->GetApplicationOfTarget(target->GetGUID());
787  ASSERT(aurApp);
788  HandleEffect(aurApp, mode, apply);
789 }
790 
791 void AuraEffect::ApplySpellMod(Unit* target, bool apply)
792 {
793  if (!m_spellmod || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
794  return;
795 
796  target->ToPlayer()->AddSpellMod(m_spellmod, apply);
797 
798  // Auras with charges do not mod amount of passive auras
799  if (GetBase()->IsUsingCharges())
800  return;
801  // reapply some passive spells after add/remove related spellmods
802  // Warning: it is a dead loop if 2 auras each other amount-shouldn't happen
803  switch (GetMiscValue())
804  {
805  case SPELLMOD_ALL_EFFECTS:
806  case SPELLMOD_EFFECT1:
807  case SPELLMOD_EFFECT2:
808  case SPELLMOD_EFFECT3:
809  {
810  ObjectGuid guid = target->GetGUID();
811  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& auras = target->GetAppliedAuras();
812  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator iter = auras.begin(); iter != auras.end(); ++iter)
813  {
814  Aura* aura = iter->second->GetBase();
815  // only passive and permament auras-active auras should have amount set on spellcast and not be affected
816  // if aura is casted by others, it will not be affected
817  if ((aura->IsPassive() || aura->IsPermanent()) && aura->GetCasterGUID() == guid && aura->GetSpellInfo()->IsAffectedBySpellMod(m_spellmod))
818  {
819  if (GetMiscValue() == SPELLMOD_ALL_EFFECTS)
820  {
821  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
822  {
823  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(i))
824  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
825  }
826  }
827  else if (GetMiscValue() == SPELLMOD_EFFECT1)
828  {
829  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(0))
830  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
831  }
832  else if (GetMiscValue() == SPELLMOD_EFFECT2)
833  {
834  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(1))
835  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
836  }
837  else //if (modOp == SPELLMOD_EFFECT3)
838  {
839  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(2))
840  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
841  }
842  }
843  }
844 
845  Pet* pet = target->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
846  if (!pet)
847  break;
848 
849  ObjectGuid petguid = pet->GetGUID();
850  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& petauras = pet->GetAppliedAuras();
851  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator iter = petauras.begin(); iter != petauras.end(); ++iter)
852  {
853  Aura* aura = iter->second->GetBase();
854  // only passive auras-active auras should have amount set on spellcast and not be affected
855  // if aura is casted by others, it will not be affected
856  if ((aura->IsPassive() || aura->IsPermanent()) && aura->GetCasterGUID() == petguid && aura->GetSpellInfo()->IsAffectedBySpellMod(m_spellmod))
857  {
858  if (GetMiscValue() == SPELLMOD_ALL_EFFECTS)
859  {
860  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
861  {
862  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(i))
863  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
864  }
865  }
866  else if (GetMiscValue() == SPELLMOD_EFFECT1)
867  {
868  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(0))
869  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
870  }
871  else if (GetMiscValue() == SPELLMOD_EFFECT2)
872  {
873  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(1))
874  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
875  }
876  else //if (modOp == SPELLMOD_EFFECT3)
877  {
878  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = aura->GetEffect(2))
879  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
880  }
881  }
882  }
883  }
884  default:
885  break;
886  }
887 }
888 
889 void AuraEffect::Update(uint32 diff, Unit* caster)
890 {
891  if (m_isPeriodic && (GetBase()->GetDuration() >= 0 || GetBase()->IsPassive() || GetBase()->IsPermanent()))
892  {
893  m_periodicTimer -= int32(diff);
894  while (m_periodicTimer <= 0)
895  {
896  ++m_tickNumber;
897 
898  // update before tick (aura can be removed in TriggerSpell or PeriodicTick calls)
899  m_periodicTimer += m_amplitude;
900  UpdatePeriodic(caster);
901 
902  std::list<AuraApplication*> effectApplications;
903  GetApplicationList(effectApplications);
904  // tick on targets of effects
905  for (std::list<AuraApplication*>::const_iterator apptItr = effectApplications.begin(); apptItr != effectApplications.end(); ++apptItr)
906  if ((*apptItr)->HasEffect(GetEffIndex()))
907  PeriodicTick(*apptItr, caster);
908  }
909  }
910 }
911 
912 void AuraEffect::UpdatePeriodic(Unit* caster)
913 {
914  switch (GetAuraType())
915  {
916  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DUMMY:
917  switch (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName)
918  {
919  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
920  switch (GetId())
921  {
922  // Drink
923  case 430:
924  case 431:
925  case 432:
926  case 1133:
927  case 1135:
928  case 1137:
929  case 10250:
930  case 22734:
931  case 27089:
932  case 34291:
933  case 43182:
934  case 43183:
935  case 46755:
936  case 49472: // Drink Coffee
937  case 57073:
938  case 61830:
939  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
940  return;
941  // Get SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN aura from spell
942  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = GetBase()->GetEffect(0))
943  {
944  if (aurEff->GetAuraType() != SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN)
945  {
946  m_isPeriodic = false;
947  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "Aura %d structure has been changed - first aura is no longer SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN", GetId());
948  }
949  else
950  {
951  // default case - not in arena
952  if (!caster->ToPlayer()->InArena())
953  {
954  aurEff->ChangeAmount(GetAmount());
955  m_isPeriodic = false;
956  }
957  else
958  {
959  // **********************************************
960  // This feature uses only in arenas
961  // **********************************************
962  // Here need increase mana regen per tick (6 second rule)
963  // on 0 tick - 0 (handled in 2 second)
964  // on 1 tick - 166% (handled in 4 second)
965  // on 2 tick - 133% (handled in 6 second)
966 
967  // Apply bonus for 1 - 4 tick
968  switch (m_tickNumber)
969  {
970  case 1: // 0%
971  aurEff->ChangeAmount(0);
972  break;
973  case 2: // 166%
974  aurEff->ChangeAmount(GetAmount() * 5 / 3);
975  break;
976  case 3: // 133%
977  aurEff->ChangeAmount(GetAmount() * 4 / 3);
978  break;
979  default: // 100% - normal regen
980  aurEff->ChangeAmount(GetAmount());
981  // No need to update after 4th tick
982  m_isPeriodic = false;
983  break;
984  }
985  }
986  }
987  }
988  break;
989  case 58549: // Tenacity
990  case 59911: // Tenacity (vehicle)
991  GetBase()->RefreshDuration();
992  break;
993  case 66823:
994  case 67618:
995  case 67619:
996  case 67620: // Paralytic Toxin
997  // Get 0 effect aura
998  if (AuraEffect* slow = GetBase()->GetEffect(0))
999  {
1000  int32 newAmount = slow->GetAmount() - 10;
1001  if (newAmount < -100)
1002  newAmount = -100;
1003  slow->ChangeAmount(newAmount);
1004  }
1005  break;
1006  case 66020:
1007  // Get 0 effect aura
1008  if (AuraEffect* slow = GetBase()->GetEffect(0))
1009  {
1010  int32 newAmount = slow->GetAmount() + GetAmount();
1011  if (newAmount > 0)
1012  newAmount = 0;
1013  slow->ChangeAmount(newAmount);
1014  }
1015  break;
1016  default:
1017  break;
1018  }
1019  break;
1020  default:
1021  break;
1022  }
1023  default:
1024  break;
1025  }
1026  GetBase()->CallScriptEffectUpdatePeriodicHandlers(this);
1027 }
1028 
1029 float AuraEffect::CalcPeriodicCritChance(Unit const* caster, Unit const* target) const
1030 {
1031  float critChance = 0.0f;
1032  if (caster)
1033  {
1034  if (Player* modOwner = caster->GetSpellModOwner())
1035  {
1036  Unit::AuraEffectList const& mPeriodicCritAuras = modOwner->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_PERIODIC_CRIT);
1037  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator itr = mPeriodicCritAuras.begin(); itr != mPeriodicCritAuras.end(); ++itr)
1038  {
1039  if ((*itr)->IsAffectedOnSpell(GetSpellInfo()))
1040  {
1041  critChance = modOwner->SpellDoneCritChance(nullptr, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), (GetSpellInfo()->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED ? RANGED_ATTACK : BASE_ATTACK), true);
1042  break;
1043  }
1044  }
1045 
1046  switch(GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName)
1047  {
1048  // Rupture - since 3.3.3 can crit
1049  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
1050  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x100000)
1051  critChance = modOwner->SpellDoneCritChance(nullptr, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), BASE_ATTACK, true);
1052  break;
1053  }
1054  }
1055  }
1056  if (target && critChance > 0.0f)
1057  critChance = target->SpellTakenCritChance(caster, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), critChance, BASE_ATTACK, true);
1058 
1059  return std::max(0.0f, critChance);
1060 }
1061 
1062 bool AuraEffect::IsAffectedOnSpell(SpellInfo const* spell) const
1063 {
1064  if (!spell)
1065  return false;
1066  // Check family name
1067  if (spell->SpellFamilyName != m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
1068  return false;
1069 
1070  // Check EffectClassMask
1071  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].SpellClassMask & spell->SpellFamilyFlags)
1072  return true;
1073  return false;
1074 }
1075 
1076 bool AuraEffect::HasSpellClassMask() const
1077 {
1078  return m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].SpellClassMask;
1079 }
1080 
1081 void AuraEffect::SendTickImmune(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
1082 {
1083  if (caster)
1084  caster->SendSpellDamageImmune(target, m_spellInfo->Id);
1085 }
1086 
1087 void AuraEffect::PeriodicTick(AuraApplication* aurApp, Unit* caster) const
1088 {
1089  bool prevented = GetBase()->CallScriptEffectPeriodicHandlers(this, aurApp);
1090  if (prevented)
1091  return;
1092 
1093  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1094 
1095  switch (GetAuraType())
1096  {
1097  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DUMMY:
1098  HandlePeriodicDummyAuraTick(target, caster);
1099  break;
1100  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL:
1101  HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellAuraTick(target, caster);
1102  break;
1103  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE:
1104  HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellWithValueAuraTick(target, caster);
1105  break;
1106  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE:
1107  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT:
1108  HandlePeriodicDamageAurasTick(target, caster);
1109  break;
1110  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH:
1111  HandlePeriodicHealthLeechAuraTick(target, caster);
1112  break;
1113  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEALTH_FUNNEL:
1114  HandlePeriodicHealthFunnelAuraTick(target, caster);
1115  break;
1116  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
1117  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH:
1118  HandlePeriodicHealAurasTick(target, caster);
1119  break;
1120  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
1121  HandlePeriodicManaLeechAuraTick(target, caster);
1122  break;
1123  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_POWER:
1124  HandleObsModPowerAuraTick(target, caster);
1125  break;
1126  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_ENERGIZE:
1127  HandlePeriodicEnergizeAuraTick(target, caster);
1128  break;
1129  case SPELL_AURA_POWER_BURN:
1130  HandlePeriodicPowerBurnAuraTick(target, caster);
1131  break;
1132  default:
1133  break;
1134  }
1135 }
1136 
1137 void AuraEffect::HandleProc(AuraApplication* aurApp, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
1138 {
1139  bool prevented = GetBase()->CallScriptEffectProcHandlers(this, aurApp, eventInfo);
1140  if (prevented)
1141  return;
1142 
1143  switch (GetAuraType())
1144  {
1145  case SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL:
1146  HandleProcTriggerSpellAuraProc(aurApp, eventInfo);
1147  break;
1148  case SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE:
1149  HandleProcTriggerSpellWithValueAuraProc(aurApp, eventInfo);
1150  break;
1151  case SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_DAMAGE:
1152  HandleProcTriggerDamageAuraProc(aurApp, eventInfo);
1153  break;
1154  case SPELL_AURA_RAID_PROC_FROM_CHARGE:
1155  HandleRaidProcFromChargeAuraProc(aurApp, eventInfo);
1156  break;
1157  case SPELL_AURA_RAID_PROC_FROM_CHARGE_WITH_VALUE:
1158  HandleRaidProcFromChargeWithValueAuraProc(aurApp, eventInfo);
1159  break;
1160  default:
1161  break;
1162  }
1163 
1164  GetBase()->CallScriptAfterEffectProcHandlers(this, aurApp, eventInfo);
1165 }
1166 
1167 void AuraEffect::CleanupTriggeredSpells(Unit* target)
1168 {
1169  uint32 tSpellId = m_spellInfo->Effects[GetEffIndex()].TriggerSpell;
1170  if (!tSpellId)
1171  return;
1172 
1173  SpellInfo const* tProto = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(tSpellId);
1174  if (!tProto)
1175  return;
1176 
1177  if (tProto->GetDuration() != -1)
1178  return;
1179 
1180  // needed for spell 43680, maybe others
1181  // TODO: is there a spell flag, which can solve this in a more sophisticated way?
1182  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[GetEffIndex()].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL &&
1183  uint32(m_spellInfo->GetDuration()) == m_spellInfo->Effects[GetEffIndex()].Amplitude)
1184  return;
1185 
1186  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(tSpellId, GetCasterGUID());
1187 }
1188 
1189 void AuraEffect::HandleShapeshiftBoosts(Unit* target, bool apply) const
1190 {
1191  uint32 spellId = 0;
1192  uint32 spellId2 = 0;
1193  //uint32 spellId3 = 0;
1194  uint32 HotWSpellId = 0;
1195 
1196  switch (GetMiscValue())
1197  {
1198  case FORM_CAT:
1199  spellId = 3025;
1200  HotWSpellId = 24900;
1201  break;
1202  case FORM_TREE:
1203  spellId = 34123;
1204  break;
1205  case FORM_TRAVEL:
1206  spellId = 5419;
1207  break;
1208  case FORM_AQUA:
1209  spellId = 5421;
1210  break;
1211  case FORM_BEAR:
1212  spellId = 1178;
1213  spellId2 = 21178;
1214  HotWSpellId = 24899;
1215  break;
1216  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
1217  spellId = 9635;
1218  spellId2 = 21178;
1219  HotWSpellId = 24899;
1220  break;
1221  case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
1222  spellId = 21156;
1223  break;
1224  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
1225  spellId = 7376;
1226  break;
1227  case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
1228  spellId = 7381;
1229  break;
1230  case FORM_MOONKIN:
1231  spellId = 24905;
1232  spellId2 = 69366;
1233  break;
1234  case FORM_FLIGHT:
1235  spellId = 33948;
1236  spellId2 = 34764;
1237  break;
1238  case FORM_FLIGHT_EPIC:
1239  spellId = 40122;
1240  spellId2 = 40121;
1241  break;
1242  case FORM_METAMORPHOSIS:
1243  spellId = 54817;
1244  spellId2 = 54879;
1245  break;
1246  case FORM_SPIRITOFREDEMPTION:
1247  spellId = 27792;
1248  spellId2 = 27795; // must be second, this important at aura remove to prevent to early iterator invalidation.
1249  break;
1250  case FORM_SHADOW:
1251  spellId = 49868;
1252  spellId2 = 71167;
1253  break;
1254  case FORM_GHOSTWOLF:
1255  spellId = 67116;
1256  break;
1257  case FORM_GHOUL:
1258  case FORM_AMBIENT:
1259  case FORM_STEALTH:
1260  case FORM_CREATURECAT:
1261  case FORM_CREATUREBEAR:
1262  break;
1263  default:
1264  break;
1265  }
1266 
1267  Player* player = target->ToPlayer();
1268  if (apply)
1269  {
1270  // Remove cooldown of spells triggered on stance change - they may share cooldown with stance spell
1271  if (spellId)
1272  {
1273  if (player)
1274  player->RemoveSpellCooldown(spellId);
1275  target->CastSpell(target, spellId, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1276  }
1277 
1278  if (spellId2)
1279  {
1280  if (player)
1281  player->RemoveSpellCooldown(spellId2);
1282  target->CastSpell(target, spellId2, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1283  }
1284 
1285  if (player)
1286  {
1287  const PlayerSpellMap& sp_list = player->GetSpellMap();
1288  for (PlayerSpellMap::const_iterator itr = sp_list.begin(); itr != sp_list.end(); ++itr)
1289  {
1290  if (itr->second->State == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED || !itr->second->IsInSpec(player->GetActiveSpec()))
1291  continue;
1292 
1293  if (itr->first == spellId || itr->first == spellId2)
1294  continue;
1295 
1296  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itr->first);
1297  if (!spellInfo || !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SpellAttr0(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE | SPELL_ATTR0_DO_NOT_DISPLAY)))
1298  continue;
1299 
1300  if (spellInfo->Stances & (1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1)))
1301  target->CastSpell(target, itr->first, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1302  }
1303 
1304  // xinef: talent stance auras are not on m_spells map, so iterate talents
1305  const PlayerTalentMap& tl_list = player->GetTalentMap();
1306  for (PlayerTalentMap::const_iterator itr = tl_list.begin(); itr != tl_list.end(); ++itr)
1307  {
1308  if (itr->second->State == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED || !itr->second->IsInSpec(player->GetActiveSpec()))
1309  continue;
1310 
1311  if (itr->first == spellId || itr->first == spellId2)
1312  continue;
1313 
1314  // Xinef: skip talents with effect learn spell
1315  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itr->first);
1316  if (!spellInfo || !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SpellAttr0(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE | SPELL_ATTR0_DO_NOT_DISPLAY)) || spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL))
1317  continue;
1318 
1319  if (spellInfo->Stances & (1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1)))
1320  target->CastSpell(target, itr->first, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1321  }
1322 
1323  // Also do it for Glyphs
1324  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_GLYPH_SLOT_INDEX; ++i)
1325  {
1326  if (uint32 glyphId = player->GetGlyph(i))
1327  {
1328  if (GlyphPropertiesEntry const* glyph = sGlyphPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(glyphId))
1329  {
1330  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(glyph->SpellId);
1331  if (!spellInfo || !spellInfo->HasAttribute(SpellAttr0(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE | SPELL_ATTR0_DO_NOT_DISPLAY)))
1332  continue;
1333  if (spellInfo->Stances & (1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1)))
1334  target->CastSpell(target, glyph->SpellId, TriggerCastFlags(TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK & ~(TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT | TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE)), nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1335  }
1336  }
1337  }
1338 
1339  // Leader of the Pack
1340  if (player->HasTalent(17007, player->GetActiveSpec()))
1341  {
1342  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(24932);
1343  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->Stances & (1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1)))
1344  target->CastSpell(target, 24932, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1345  }
1346  // Improved Barkskin - apply/remove armor bonus due to shapeshift
1347  if (player->HasTalent(63410, player->GetActiveSpec()) || player->HasTalent(63411, player->GetActiveSpec()))
1348  {
1349  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(66530);
1350  if (GetMiscValue() == FORM_TRAVEL || GetMiscValue() == FORM_NONE) // "while in Travel Form or while not shapeshifted"
1351  target->CastSpell(target, 66530, true);
1352  }
1353  // Heart of the Wild
1354  if (HotWSpellId)
1355  {
1356  // hacky, but the only way as spell family is not SPELLFAMILY_DRUID
1357  Unit::AuraEffectList const& mModTotalStatPct = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TOTAL_STAT_PERCENTAGE);
1358  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = mModTotalStatPct.begin(); i != mModTotalStatPct.end(); ++i)
1359  {
1360  // Heart of the Wild
1361  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 240 && (*i)->GetMiscValue() == STAT_INTELLECT)
1362  {
1363  int32 HotWMod = (*i)->GetAmount() / 2; // For each 2% Intelligence, you get 1% stamina and 1% attack power.
1364 
1365  target->CastCustomSpell(target, HotWSpellId, &HotWMod, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1366  break;
1367  }
1368  }
1369  }
1370  switch (GetMiscValue())
1371  {
1372  case FORM_CAT:
1373  // Savage Roar
1374  if (target->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 0, 0x10000000, 0))
1375  target->CastSpell(target, 62071, true);
1376  // Nurturing Instinct
1377  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_HEALING_OF_STAT_PERCENT, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 2254, 0))
1378  {
1379  uint32 spellId3 = 0;
1380  switch (aurEff->GetId())
1381  {
1382  case 33872:
1383  spellId3 = 47179;
1384  break;
1385  case 33873:
1386  spellId3 = 47180;
1387  break;
1388  }
1389  target->CastSpell(target, spellId3, true, nullptr, this, target->GetGUID());
1390  }
1391  // Master Shapeshifter - Cat
1392  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC, 2851, 0))
1393  {
1394  int32 bp = aurEff->GetAmount();
1395  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 48420, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, true);
1396  }
1397  break;
1398  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
1399  case FORM_BEAR:
1400  // Master Shapeshifter - Bear
1401  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC, 2851, 0))
1402  {
1403  int32 bp = aurEff->GetAmount();
1404  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 48418, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, true);
1405  }
1406  // Survival of the Fittest
1407  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TOTAL_STAT_PERCENTAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 961, 0))
1408  {
1409  int32 bp = aurEff->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcValue();
1410  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 62069, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, true, 0, this, target->GetGUID());
1411  }
1412  break;
1413  case FORM_MOONKIN:
1414  // Master Shapeshifter - Moonkin
1415  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC, 2851, 0))
1416  {
1417  int32 bp = aurEff->GetAmount();
1418  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 48421, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, true);
1419  }
1420  break;
1421  // Master Shapeshifter - Tree of Life
1422  case FORM_TREE:
1423  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC, 2851, 0))
1424  {
1425  int32 bp = aurEff->GetAmount();
1426  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 48422, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, true);
1427  }
1428  break;
1429  }
1430  }
1431  }
1432  else
1433  {
1434  if (spellId)
1435  target->RemoveOwnedAura(spellId);
1436  if (spellId2)
1437  target->RemoveOwnedAura(spellId2);
1438 
1439  // Improved Barkskin - apply/remove armor bonus due to shapeshift
1440  if (player)
1441  {
1442  if (player->HasTalent(63410, player->GetActiveSpec()) || player->HasTalent(63411, player->GetActiveSpec()))
1443  {
1444  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(66530);
1445  target->CastSpell(target, 66530, true);
1446  }
1447  }
1448 
1449  const Unit::AuraEffectList& shapeshifts = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT);
1450  AuraEffect* newAura = nullptr;
1451  // Iterate through all the shapeshift auras that the target has, if there is another aura with SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT, then this aura is being removed due to that one being applied
1452  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator itr = shapeshifts.begin(); itr != shapeshifts.end(); ++itr)
1453  {
1454  if ((*itr) != this)
1455  {
1456  newAura = *itr;
1457  break;
1458  }
1459  }
1460 
1461  // Use the new aura to see on what stance the target will be
1462  uint32 newStance = (1 << ((newAura ? newAura->GetMiscValue() : 0) - 1));
1463 
1464  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& tAuras = target->GetAppliedAuras();
1465  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator itr = tAuras.begin(); itr != tAuras.end();)
1466  {
1467  // If the stances are not compatible with the spell, remove it
1468  // Xinef: Remove all passive auras, they will be added if needed
1469  if (itr->second->GetBase()->IsRemovedOnShapeLost(target) && (!(itr->second->GetBase()->GetSpellInfo()->Stances & newStance) || itr->second->GetBase()->IsPassive()))
1470  target->RemoveAura(itr);
1471  else
1472  ++itr;
1473  }
1474 
1475  // Xinef: Remove autoattack spells
1476  if (Spell* spell = target->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL))
1477  if (spell->GetSpellInfo()->CheckShapeshift(newAura ? newAura->GetMiscValue() : 0) != SPELL_CAST_OK)
1478  spell->cancel(true);
1479  }
1480 }
1481 
1482 /*********************************************************/
1483 /*** AURA EFFECT HANDLERS ***/
1484 /*********************************************************/
1485 
1486 /**************************************/
1487 /*** VISIBILITY & PHASES ***/
1488 /**************************************/
1489 
1490 void AuraEffect::HandleModInvisibilityDetect(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1491 {
1492  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
1493  return;
1494 
1495  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1496  InvisibilityType type = InvisibilityType(GetMiscValue());
1497 
1498  if (apply)
1499  {
1500  target->m_invisibilityDetect.AddFlag(type);
1501  target->m_invisibilityDetect.AddValue(type, GetAmount());
1502  }
1503  else
1504  {
1505  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY_DETECT))
1506  target->m_invisibilityDetect.DelFlag(type);
1507 
1508  target->m_invisibilityDetect.AddValue(type, -GetAmount());
1509  }
1510 
1511  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1512  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer());
1513 }
1514 
1515 void AuraEffect::HandleModInvisibility(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1516 {
1517  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
1518  return;
1519 
1520  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1521  InvisibilityType type = InvisibilityType(GetMiscValue());
1522 
1523  if (apply)
1524  {
1525  // apply glow vision
1526  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && type == INVISIBILITY_GENERAL)
1527  target->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES_2_OFFSET_AURA_VISION, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_INVISIBILITY_GLOW);
1528 
1529  target->m_invisibility.AddFlag(type);
1530  target->m_invisibility.AddValue(type, GetAmount());
1531  }
1532  else
1533  {
1534  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY))
1535  {
1536  // if not have different invisibility auras.
1537  // always remove glow vision
1538  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1539  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_INVISIBILITY_GLOW);
1540 
1541  target->m_invisibility.DelFlag(type);
1542  }
1543  else
1544  {
1545  bool found = false;
1546  Unit::AuraEffectList const& invisAuras = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY);
1547  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = invisAuras.begin(); i != invisAuras.end(); ++i)
1548  {
1549  if (GetMiscValue() == (*i)->GetMiscValue())
1550  {
1551  found = true;
1552  break;
1553  }
1554  }
1555  if (!found)
1556  {
1557  // if not have invisibility auras of type INVISIBILITY_GENERAL
1558  // remove glow vision
1559  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && type == INVISIBILITY_GENERAL)
1560  {
1561  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES_2_OFFSET_AURA_VISION, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_INVISIBILITY_GLOW);
1562  }
1563 
1564  target->m_invisibility.DelFlag(type);
1565  }
1566  }
1567 
1568  target->m_invisibility.AddValue(type, -GetAmount());
1569  }
1570 
1571  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1572  if (apply && (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
1573  {
1574  // drop flag at invisibiliy in bg
1575  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
1576  }
1577 
1578  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() || target->GetMap()->Instanceable(), true);
1579  target->bRequestForcedVisibilityUpdate = false;
1580 }
1581 
1582 void AuraEffect::HandleModStealthDetect(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1583 {
1584  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
1585  return;
1586 
1587  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1588  StealthType type = StealthType(GetMiscValue());
1589 
1590  if (apply)
1591  {
1592  target->m_stealthDetect.AddFlag(type);
1593  target->m_stealthDetect.AddValue(type, GetAmount());
1594  }
1595  else
1596  {
1597  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH_DETECT))
1598  target->m_stealthDetect.DelFlag(type);
1599 
1600  target->m_stealthDetect.AddValue(type, -GetAmount());
1601  }
1602 
1603  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1604  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer());
1605 }
1606 
1607 void AuraEffect::HandleModStealth(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1608 {
1609  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
1610  return;
1611 
1612  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1613  StealthType type = StealthType(GetMiscValue());
1614 
1615  if (apply)
1616  {
1617  target->m_stealth.AddFlag(type);
1618  target->m_stealth.AddValue(type, GetAmount());
1619 
1620  target->SetStandFlags(UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_CREEP);
1621  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1622  target->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_STEALTH);
1623 
1624  // interrupt autoshot
1625  if (target->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL))
1626  {
1627  target->FinishSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
1628  target->ToPlayer()->SendAutoRepeatCancel(target);
1629  }
1630  }
1631  else
1632  {
1633  target->m_stealth.AddValue(type, -GetAmount());
1634 
1635  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH)) // if last SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH
1636  {
1637  target->m_stealth.DelFlag(type);
1638 
1639  target->RemoveStandFlags(UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_CREEP);
1640  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1641  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_STEALTH);
1642  }
1643  }
1644 
1645  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1646  if (apply && (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
1647  {
1648  // drop flag at stealth in bg
1649  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
1650  }
1651 
1652  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() || target->GetMap()->Instanceable(), true);
1653  target->bRequestForcedVisibilityUpdate = false;
1654 }
1655 
1656 void AuraEffect::HandleModStealthLevel(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1657 {
1658  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
1659  return;
1660 
1661  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1662  StealthType type = StealthType(GetMiscValue());
1663 
1664  if (apply)
1665  target->m_stealth.AddValue(type, GetAmount());
1666  else
1667  target->m_stealth.AddValue(type, -GetAmount());
1668 
1669  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1670  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer());
1671 }
1672 
1673 void AuraEffect::HandleDetectAmore(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1674 {
1675  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
1676  {
1677  return;
1678  }
1679 
1680  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1681  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
1682  {
1683  return;
1684  }
1685 
1686  if (apply)
1687  {
1688  target->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, 1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1));
1689  }
1690  else
1691  {
1692  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_AMORE))
1693  {
1694  Unit::AuraEffectList const& amoreAuras = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_AMORE);
1695  for (AuraEffect const* aurEff : amoreAuras)
1696  if (GetMiscValue() == aurEff->GetMiscValue())
1697  {
1698  return;
1699  }
1700  }
1701 
1702  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, 1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1));
1703  }
1704 }
1705 
1706 void AuraEffect::HandleSpiritOfRedemption(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1707 {
1708  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
1709  return;
1710 
1711  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1712 
1713  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
1714  return;
1715 
1716  // prepare spirit state
1717  if (apply)
1718  {
1719  // disable breath/etc timers
1720  target->ToPlayer()->StopMirrorTimers();
1721 
1722  // set stand state (expected in this form)
1723  if (!target->IsStandState())
1724  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
1725 
1726  target->SetHealth(1);
1727  }
1728  // die at aura end
1729  else if (target->IsAlive())
1730  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1731  target->setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
1732 
1733  // xinef: damage immunity spell, not needed because of 93 aura (adds non_attackable state)
1734  // xinef: probably blizzard added it just in case in wotlk (id > 46000)
1735  if (apply)
1736  target->CastSpell(target, 62371, true);
1737  else
1738  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(62371);
1739 }
1740 
1741 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraGhost(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1742 {
1743  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
1744  return;
1745 
1746  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1747 
1748  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
1749  return;
1750 
1751  if (apply)
1752  {
1753  target->SetFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_GHOST);
1754  target->m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1755  target->m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST);
1756  }
1757  else
1758  {
1759  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_GHOST))
1760  return;
1761 
1762  target->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_GHOST);
1763  target->m_serverSideVisibility.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_ALIVE);
1764  target->m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.SetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST, GHOST_VISIBILITY_ALIVE);
1765  }
1766 }
1767 
1768 void AuraEffect::HandlePhase(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1769 {
1770  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
1771  return;
1772 
1773  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1774 
1775  // no-phase is also phase state so same code for apply and remove
1776  uint32 newPhase = target->GetPhaseByAuras();
1777 
1778  if (Player* player = target->ToPlayer())
1779  {
1780  if (!newPhase)
1781  newPhase = PHASEMASK_NORMAL;
1782 
1783  // do not change phase to GM with all phases enabled
1784  if (player->IsGameMaster())
1785  newPhase = PHASEMASK_ANYWHERE;
1786 
1787  player->SetPhaseMask(newPhase, false);
1788  player->GetSession()->SendSetPhaseShift(newPhase);
1789  }
1790  else
1791  {
1792  if (!newPhase)
1793  {
1794  newPhase = PHASEMASK_NORMAL;
1795  if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1796  if (CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureData(creature->GetSpawnId()))
1797  newPhase = data->phaseMask;
1798  }
1799 
1800  target->SetPhaseMask(newPhase, false);
1801  }
1802 
1803  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
1804  // phase auras normally not expected at BG but anyway better check
1805  if (apply)
1806  {
1807  // drop flag at invisibiliy in bg
1808  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
1809  }
1810 
1811  // need triggering visibility update base at phase update of not GM invisible (other GMs anyway see in any phases)
1812  if (target->IsVisible())
1813  {
1814  if (!target->GetMap()->Instanceable())
1815  {
1816  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(false);
1817  target->m_last_notify_position.Relocate(-5000.0f, -5000.0f, -5000.0f);
1818  }
1819  else
1820  target->UpdateObjectVisibility();
1821  }
1822 }
1823 
1824 /**********************/
1825 /*** UNIT MODEL ***/
1826 /**********************/
1827 
1828 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModShapeshift(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
1829 {
1830  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL_OR_REAPPLY_MASK))
1831  return;
1832 
1833  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
1834 
1835  uint32 modelid = 0;
1836  Powers PowerType = POWER_MANA;
1837  ShapeshiftForm form = ShapeshiftForm(GetMiscValue());
1838 
1839  switch (form)
1840  {
1841  case FORM_CAT: // 0x01
1842  case FORM_GHOUL: // 0x07
1843  PowerType = POWER_ENERGY;
1844  break;
1845 
1846  case FORM_BEAR: // 0x05
1847  case FORM_DIREBEAR: // 0x08
1848 
1849  case FORM_BATTLESTANCE: // 0x11
1850  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE: // 0x12
1851  case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE: // 0x13
1852  PowerType = POWER_RAGE;
1853  break;
1854 
1855  case FORM_TREE: // 0x02
1856  case FORM_TRAVEL: // 0x03
1857  case FORM_AQUA: // 0x04
1858  case FORM_AMBIENT: // 0x06
1859 
1860  case FORM_STEVES_GHOUL: // 0x09
1861  case FORM_THARONJA_SKELETON: // 0x0A
1862  case FORM_TEST_OF_STRENGTH: // 0x0B
1863  case FORM_BLB_PLAYER: // 0x0C
1864  case FORM_SHADOW_DANCE: // 0x0D
1865  case FORM_CREATUREBEAR: // 0x0E
1866  case FORM_CREATURECAT: // 0x0F
1867  case FORM_GHOSTWOLF: // 0x10
1868 
1869  case FORM_TEST: // 0x14
1870  case FORM_ZOMBIE: // 0x15
1871  case FORM_METAMORPHOSIS: // 0x16
1872  case FORM_UNDEAD: // 0x19
1873  case FORM_MASTER_ANGLER: // 0x1A
1874  case FORM_FLIGHT_EPIC: // 0x1B
1875  case FORM_SHADOW: // 0x1C
1876  case FORM_FLIGHT: // 0x1D
1877  case FORM_STEALTH: // 0x1E
1878  case FORM_MOONKIN: // 0x1F
1879  case FORM_SPIRITOFREDEMPTION: // 0x20
1880  break;
1881  default:
1882  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "Auras: Unknown Shapeshift Type: %u", GetMiscValue());
1883  }
1884 
1885  modelid = target->GetModelForForm(form);
1886 
1887  if (apply)
1888  {
1889  // remove polymorph before changing display id to keep new display id
1890  switch (form)
1891  {
1892  case FORM_CAT:
1893  case FORM_TREE:
1894  case FORM_TRAVEL:
1895  case FORM_AQUA:
1896  case FORM_BEAR:
1897  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
1898  case FORM_FLIGHT_EPIC:
1899  case FORM_FLIGHT:
1900  case FORM_MOONKIN:
1901  {
1902  // remove movement affects
1903  target->RemoveAurasByShapeShift();
1904 
1905  // and polymorphic affects
1906  if (target->IsPolymorphed())
1907  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(target->getTransForm());
1908  break;
1909  }
1910  default:
1911  break;
1912  }
1913 
1914  // remove other shapeshift before applying a new one
1915  // xinef: rogue shouldnt be wrapped by this check (shadow dance vs stealth)
1916  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE)
1917  target->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT, ObjectGuid::Empty, GetBase());
1918 
1919  // stop handling the effect if it was removed by linked event
1920  if (aurApp->GetRemoveMode())
1921  return;
1922 
1923  if (PowerType != POWER_MANA)
1924  {
1925  uint32 oldPower = target->GetPower(PowerType);
1926  // reset power to default values only at power change
1927  if (target->getPowerType() != PowerType)
1928  target->setPowerType(PowerType);
1929 
1930  switch (form)
1931  {
1932  case FORM_CAT:
1933  case FORM_BEAR:
1934  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
1935  {
1936  // get furor proc chance
1937  uint32 FurorChance = 0;
1938  if (AuraEffect const* dummy = target->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 238, 0))
1939  FurorChance = std::max(dummy->GetAmount(), 0);
1940 
1941  switch (GetMiscValue())
1942  {
1943  case FORM_CAT:
1944  {
1945  int32 basePoints = int32(std::min(oldPower, FurorChance));
1946  target->SetPower(POWER_ENERGY, 0);
1947  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 17099, &basePoints, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
1948  break;
1949  }
1950  case FORM_BEAR:
1951  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
1952  if (urand(0, 99) < FurorChance)
1953  target->CastSpell(target, 17057, true);
1954  break;
1955  default:
1956  {
1957  uint32 newEnergy = std::min(target->GetPower(POWER_ENERGY), FurorChance);
1958  target->SetPower(POWER_ENERGY, newEnergy);
1959  break;
1960  }
1961  }
1962  break;
1963  }
1964  default:
1965  break;
1966  }
1967  }
1968  // stop handling the effect if it was removed by linked event
1969  if (aurApp->GetRemoveMode())
1970  return;
1971 
1972  target->SetShapeshiftForm(form);
1973  // xinef: allow shapeshift to override model id if forced transform aura is not present!
1974  if (modelid > 0)
1975  {
1976  bool allow = true;
1977  if (target->getTransForm())
1978  if (SpellInfo const* transformSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(target->getTransForm()))
1979  if (transformSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES) || !transformSpellInfo->IsPositive())
1980  allow = false;
1981 
1982  if (allow)
1983  target->SetDisplayId(modelid);
1984  }
1985  }
1986  else
1987  {
1988  // reset model id if no other auras present
1989  // may happen when aura is applied on linked event on aura removal
1990  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT))
1991  {
1992  target->SetShapeshiftForm(FORM_NONE);
1993  if (target->getClass() == CLASS_DRUID)
1994  {
1995  target->setPowerType(POWER_MANA);
1996  // Remove movement impairing effects also when shifting out
1997  target->RemoveAurasByShapeShift();
1998  }
1999  }
2000 
2001  if (modelid > 0)
2002  target->RestoreDisplayId();
2003 
2004  switch (form)
2005  {
2006  // Nordrassil Harness - bonus
2007  case FORM_BEAR:
2008  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
2009  case FORM_CAT:
2010  if (AuraEffect* dummy = target->GetAuraEffect(37315, 0))
2011  target->CastSpell(target, 37316, true, nullptr, dummy);
2012  break;
2013  // Nordrassil Regalia - bonus
2014  case FORM_MOONKIN:
2015  if (AuraEffect* dummy = target->GetAuraEffect(37324, 0))
2016  target->CastSpell(target, 37325, true, nullptr, dummy);
2017  break;
2018  case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
2019  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
2020  case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
2021  {
2022  uint32 Rage_val = 0;
2023  // Defensive Tactics
2024  if (form == FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE)
2025  {
2026  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = target->IsScriptOverriden(m_spellInfo, 831))
2027  Rage_val += aurEff->GetAmount() * 10;
2028  }
2029  // Stance mastery + Tactical mastery (both passive, and last have aura only in defense stance, but need apply at any stance switch)
2030  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2031  {
2032  // Stance mastery - trainer spell
2033  PlayerSpellMap const& sp_list = target->ToPlayer()->GetSpellMap();
2034  for (PlayerSpellMap::const_iterator itr = sp_list.begin(); itr != sp_list.end(); ++itr)
2035  {
2036  if (itr->second->State == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED || !itr->second->IsInSpec(target->ToPlayer()->GetActiveSpec()))
2037  continue;
2038 
2039  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itr->first);
2040  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR && spellInfo->SpellIconID == 139)
2041  Rage_val += target->CalculateSpellDamage(target, spellInfo, 0) * 10;
2042  }
2043 
2044  // Tactical Mastery - talent
2045  PlayerTalentMap const& tp_list = target->ToPlayer()->GetTalentMap();
2046  for (PlayerTalentMap::const_iterator itr = tp_list.begin(); itr != tp_list.end(); ++itr)
2047  {
2048  if (itr->second->State == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED || !itr->second->IsInSpec(target->ToPlayer()->GetActiveSpec()))
2049  continue;
2050 
2051  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(itr->first);
2052  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR && spellInfo->SpellIconID == 139)
2053  Rage_val += target->CalculateSpellDamage(target, spellInfo, 0) * 10;
2054  }
2055  }
2056  if (target->GetPower(POWER_RAGE) > Rage_val)
2057  target->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, Rage_val);
2058  break;
2059  }
2060  default:
2061  break;
2062  }
2063  }
2064 
2065  // adding/removing linked auras
2066  // add/remove the shapeshift aura's boosts
2067  HandleShapeshiftBoosts(target, apply);
2068 
2069  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2070  target->ToPlayer()->InitDataForForm();
2071 
2072  if (target->getClass() == CLASS_DRUID)
2073  {
2074  // Dash
2075  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = target->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_SPEED, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 0, 0, 0x8))
2076  aurEff->RecalculateAmount();
2077 
2078  // Disarm handling
2079  // If druid shifts while being disarmed we need to deal with that since forms aren't affected by disarm
2080  // and also HandleAuraModDisarm is not triggered
2081  if (!target->CanUseAttackType(BASE_ATTACK))
2082  {
2083  if (Item* pItem = target->ToPlayer()->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND))
2084  {
2085  target->ToPlayer()->_ApplyWeaponDamage(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND, pItem->GetTemplate(), nullptr, apply);
2086  }
2087  }
2088  }
2089 
2090  // stop handling the effect if it was removed by linked event
2091  if (apply && aurApp->GetRemoveMode())
2092  return;
2093 
2094  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2095  {
2096  SpellShapeshiftEntry const* shapeInfo = sSpellShapeshiftStore.LookupEntry(form);
2097  // Learn spells for shapeshift form - no need to send action bars or add spells to spellbook
2098  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SHAPESHIFT_SPELLS; ++i)
2099  {
2100  if (!shapeInfo->stanceSpell[i])
2101  continue;
2102  if (apply)
2103  target->ToPlayer()->_addSpell(shapeInfo->stanceSpell[i], SPEC_MASK_ALL, true);
2104  else
2105  target->ToPlayer()->removeSpell(shapeInfo->stanceSpell[i], SPEC_MASK_ALL, true);
2106  }
2107  }
2108 }
2109 
2110 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraTransform(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2111 {
2112  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2113  return;
2114 
2115  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2116 
2117  if (apply)
2118  {
2119  // update active transform spell only when transform or shapeshift not set or not overwriting negative by positive case
2120  if (GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES) || !target->GetModelForForm(target->GetShapeshiftForm()) || !GetSpellInfo()->IsPositive())
2121  {
2122  // special case (spell specific functionality)
2123  if (GetMiscValue() == 0)
2124  {
2125  switch (GetId())
2126  {
2127  // Orb of Deception
2128  case 16739:
2129  {
2130  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2131  return;
2132 
2133  switch (target->getRace())
2134  {
2135  // Blood Elf
2136  case RACE_BLOODELF:
2137  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 17829 : 17830);
2138  break;
2139  // Orc
2140  case RACE_ORC:
2141  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10139 : 10140);
2142  break;
2143  // Troll
2144  case RACE_TROLL:
2145  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10135 : 10134);
2146  break;
2147  // Tauren
2148  case RACE_TAUREN:
2149  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10136 : 10147);
2150  break;
2151  // Undead
2152  case RACE_UNDEAD_PLAYER:
2153  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10146 : 10145);
2154  break;
2155  // Draenei
2156  case RACE_DRAENEI:
2157  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 17827 : 17828);
2158  break;
2159  // Dwarf
2160  case RACE_DWARF:
2161  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10141 : 10142);
2162  break;
2163  // Gnome
2164  case RACE_GNOME:
2165  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10148 : 10149);
2166  break;
2167  // Human
2168  case RACE_HUMAN:
2169  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10137 : 10138);
2170  break;
2171  // Night Elf
2172  case RACE_NIGHTELF:
2173  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 10143 : 10144);
2174  break;
2175  default:
2176  break;
2177  }
2178  break;
2179  }
2180  // Murloc costume
2181  case 42365:
2182  target->SetDisplayId(21723);
2183  break;
2184  // Dread Corsair
2185  case 50517:
2186  // Corsair Costume
2187  case 51926:
2188  {
2189  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2190  return;
2191 
2192  switch (target->getRace())
2193  {
2194  // Blood Elf
2195  case RACE_BLOODELF:
2196  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25032 : 25043);
2197  break;
2198  // Orc
2199  case RACE_ORC:
2200  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25039 : 25050);
2201  break;
2202  // Troll
2203  case RACE_TROLL:
2204  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25041 : 25052);
2205  break;
2206  // Tauren
2207  case RACE_TAUREN:
2208  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25040 : 25051);
2209  break;
2210  // Undead
2211  case RACE_UNDEAD_PLAYER:
2212  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25042 : 25053);
2213  break;
2214  // Draenei
2215  case RACE_DRAENEI:
2216  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25033 : 25044);
2217  break;
2218  // Dwarf
2219  case RACE_DWARF:
2220  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25034 : 25045);
2221  break;
2222  // Gnome
2223  case RACE_GNOME:
2224  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25035 : 25046);
2225  break;
2226  // Human
2227  case RACE_HUMAN:
2228  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25037 : 25048);
2229  break;
2230  // Night Elf
2231  case RACE_NIGHTELF:
2232  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25038 : 25049);
2233  break;
2234  default:
2235  break;
2236  }
2237  break;
2238  }
2239  // Pygmy Oil
2240  case 53806:
2241  target->SetDisplayId(22512);
2242  break;
2243  // Honor the Dead
2244  case 65386:
2245  case 65495:
2246  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 29203 : 29204);
2247  break;
2248  // Darkspear Pride
2249  case 75532:
2250  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 31737 : 31738);
2251  break;
2252  // Gnomeregan Pride
2253  case 75531:
2254  target->SetDisplayId(target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 31654 : 31655);
2255  break;
2256  default:
2257  break;
2258  }
2259  }
2260  else
2261  {
2262  CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(GetMiscValue());
2263  if (!ci)
2264  {
2265  target->SetDisplayId(16358); // pig pink ^_^
2266  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "Auras: unknown creature id = %d (only need its modelid) From Spell Aura Transform in Spell ID = %d", GetMiscValue(), GetId());
2267  }
2268  else
2269  {
2270  uint32 model_id = 0;
2271 
2272  if (uint32 modelid = ci->GetRandomValidModelId())
2273  model_id = modelid; // Will use the default model here
2274 
2275  // Polymorph (sheep)
2276  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_MAGE && GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 82 && GetSpellInfo()->SpellVisual[0] == 12978)
2277  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2278  if (caster->HasAura(52648)) // Glyph of the Penguin
2279  model_id = 26452;
2280 
2281  target->SetDisplayId(model_id);
2282 
2283  // Dragonmaw Illusion (set mount model also)
2284  if (GetId() == 42016 && target->GetMountID() && !target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED).empty())
2285  target->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, 16314);
2286  }
2287  }
2288  }
2289 
2290  // update active transform spell only when transform or shapeshift not set or not overwriting negative by positive case
2291  SpellInfo const* transformSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(target->getTransForm());
2292  if (!transformSpellInfo || GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES) || !GetSpellInfo()->IsPositive() || transformSpellInfo->IsPositive())
2293  target->setTransForm(GetId());
2294 
2295  // polymorph case
2296  if ((mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL) && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && target->IsPolymorphed())
2297  {
2298  // for players, start regeneration after 1s (in polymorph fast regeneration case)
2299  // only if caster is Player (after patch 2.4.2)
2300  if (GetCasterGUID().IsPlayer())
2301  target->ToPlayer()->setRegenTimerCount(1 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2302 
2303  //dismount polymorphed target (after patch 2.4.2)
2304  if (target->IsMounted())
2305  target->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
2306  }
2307  }
2308  else
2309  {
2310  // HandleEffect(this, AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT, true) will reapply it if need
2311  if (target->getTransForm() == GetId())
2312  target->setTransForm(0);
2313 
2314  target->RestoreDisplayId();
2315 
2316  // Dragonmaw Illusion (restore mount model)
2317  if (GetId() == 42016 && target->GetMountID() == 16314)
2318  {
2319  if (!target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED).empty())
2320  {
2321  uint32 cr_id = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED).front()->GetMiscValue();
2322  if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(cr_id))
2323  {
2324  uint32 displayID = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(ci);
2325  sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID);
2326 
2327  target->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, displayID);
2328  }
2329  }
2330  }
2331  }
2332 }
2333 
2334 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModScale(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2335 {
2336  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2337  return;
2338 
2339  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2340 
2341  float scale = target->GetObjectScale();
2342  ApplyPercentModFloatVar(scale, float(GetAmount()), apply);
2343  target->SetObjectScale(scale);
2344 }
2345 
2346 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraCloneCaster(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2347 {
2348  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2349  return;
2350 
2351  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2352 
2353  if (apply)
2354  {
2355  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
2356  if (!caster || caster == target)
2357  return;
2358 
2359  // What must be cloned? at least display and scale
2360  target->SetDisplayId(caster->GetDisplayId());
2361  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_MIRROR_IMAGE);
2362  }
2363  else
2364  {
2365  target->SetDisplayId(target->GetNativeDisplayId());
2366  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_MIRROR_IMAGE);
2367  }
2368 }
2369 
2370 /************************/
2371 /*** FIGHT ***/
2372 /************************/
2373 
2374 void AuraEffect::HandleFeignDeath(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2375 {
2376  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
2377  return;
2378 
2379  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2380 
2381  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2382  return;
2383 
2384  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
2385  {
2386  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
2387  }
2388 
2389  if (apply)
2390  {
2391  /*
2392  WorldPacket data(SMSG_FEIGN_DEATH_RESISTED, 9);
2393  data<<target->GetGUID();
2394  data<<uint8(0);
2395  target->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
2396  */
2397 
2398  UnitList targets;
2399  Acore::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(target, target, target->GetVisibilityRange()); // no VISIBILITY_COMPENSATION, distance is enough
2400  Acore::UnitListSearcher<Acore::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(target, targets, u_check);
2401  Cell::VisitAllObjects(target, searcher, target->GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange());
2402  for (UnitList::iterator iter = targets.begin(); iter != targets.end(); ++iter)
2403  {
2404  if (!(*iter)->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
2405  continue;
2406 
2407  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; i++)
2408  {
2409  if ((*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(i) && (*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(i)->m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() == target->GetGUID())
2410  {
2411  const SpellInfo* si = (*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(i)->GetSpellInfo();
2412  if (si->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT) && (*iter)->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2413  {
2414  Creature* c = (*iter)->ToCreature();
2415  if ((!c->IsPet() && c->GetCreatureTemplate()->rank == CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS) || c->isWorldBoss() || c->IsDungeonBoss())
2416  continue;
2417  }
2418  bool interrupt = false; // pussywizard: skip spells that don't target units, but casted on unit (eg. TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ENEMY)
2419  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
2420  if (si->Effects[j].Effect && (si->Effects[j].GetUsedTargetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT || si->Effects[j].GetUsedTargetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT_AND_DEST))
2421  {
2422  // at least one effect truly targets an unit, interrupt the spell
2423  interrupt = true;
2424  break;
2425  }
2426  if (interrupt)
2427  (*iter)->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
2428  }
2429  }
2430  }
2431 
2432  if (target->GetInstanceScript() && target->GetInstanceScript()->IsEncounterInProgress())
2433  {
2434  // Xinef: replaced with CombatStop(false)
2435  target->AttackStop();
2436  target->RemoveAllAttackers();
2437  target->getHostileRefMgr().addThreatPercent(-100);
2438  target->ToPlayer()->SendAttackSwingCancelAttack(); // melee and ranged forced attack cancel
2439  }
2440  else
2441  {
2442  target->CombatStop();
2443  target->getHostileRefMgr().deleteReferences();
2444  }
2445 
2446  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
2447 
2448  // prevent interrupt message
2449  if (GetCasterGUID() == target->GetGUID())
2450  {
2451  if (target->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
2452  target->FinishSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL, true);
2453 
2454  // interrupt autoshot
2455  if (target->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL))
2456  {
2457  target->FinishSpell(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
2458  target->ToPlayer()->SendAutoRepeatCancel(target);
2459  }
2460  }
2461 
2462  target->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
2463 
2464  // stop handling the effect if it was removed by linked event
2465  if (aurApp->GetRemoveMode())
2466  return;
2467  // blizz like 2.0.x
2468  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREVENT_EMOTES_FROM_CHAT_TEXT);
2469  // blizz like 2.0.x
2470  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
2471  // blizz like 2.0.x
2472  target->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_DEAD);
2473 
2474  target->AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_DIED);
2475  }
2476  else
2477  {
2478  /*
2479  WorldPacket data(SMSG_FEIGN_DEATH_RESISTED, 9);
2480  data<<target->GetGUID();
2481  data<<uint8(1);
2482  target->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
2483  */
2484  // blizz like 2.0.x
2485  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREVENT_EMOTES_FROM_CHAT_TEXT);
2486  // blizz like 2.0.x
2487  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
2488  // blizz like 2.0.x
2489  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_DEAD);
2490 
2491  target->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_DIED);
2492  }
2493 }
2494 
2495 void AuraEffect::HandleModUnattackable(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2496 {
2497  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2498  return;
2499 
2500  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2501 
2502  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2503  if (!apply && target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_UNATTACKABLE))
2504  return;
2505 
2506  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE, apply);
2507 
2508  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
2509  if (apply && (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
2510  {
2511  // xinef: this aura should not stop combat (movie with sindragosa proves that)
2512  //target->CombatStop();
2513  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
2514  }
2515 }
2516 
2517 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModDisarm(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2518 {
2519  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
2520  return;
2521 
2522  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2523
