2524  AuraType type = GetAuraType();
2525 
2526  //Prevent handling aura twice
2527  if ((apply) ? target->GetAuraEffectsByType(type).size() > 1 : target->HasAuraType(type))
2528  return;
2529 
2530  uint32 field, flag, slot;
2531  WeaponAttackType attType;
2532  switch (type)
2533  {
2534  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM:
2535  field = UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS;
2536  flag = UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED;
2537  slot = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND;
2538  attType = BASE_ATTACK;
2539  break;
2540  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_OFFHAND:
2541  field = UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2;
2542  flag = UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_OFFHAND;
2543  slot = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND;
2544  attType = OFF_ATTACK;
2545  break;
2546  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_RANGED:
2547  field = UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2;
2548  flag = UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_RANGED;
2549  slot = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED;
2550  attType = RANGED_ATTACK;
2551  break;
2552  default:
2553  return;
2554  }
2555 
2556  // if disarm aura is to be removed, remove the flag first to reapply damage/aura mods
2557  if (!apply)
2558  target->RemoveFlag(field, flag);
2559 
2560  // Handle damage modification, shapeshifted druids are not affected
2561  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (!target->IsInFeralForm() || target->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_GHOSTWOLF))
2562  {
2563  if (Item* pItem = target->ToPlayer()->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, slot))
2564  {
2565  uint8 attacktype = Player::GetAttackBySlot(slot);
2566 
2567  if (attacktype < MAX_ATTACK)
2568  {
2569  target->ToPlayer()->_ApplyWeaponDamage(slot, pItem->GetTemplate(), nullptr, !apply);
2570  target->ToPlayer()->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods(pItem, WeaponAttackType(attacktype), !apply);
2571  }
2572  }
2573  }
2574 
2575  // if disarm effects should be applied, wait to set flag until damage mods are unapplied
2576  if (apply)
2577  target->SetFlag(field, flag);
2578 
2579  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->ToCreature()->GetCurrentEquipmentId())
2580  target->UpdateDamagePhysical(attType);
2581 }
2582 
2583 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModSilence(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2584 {
2585  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
2586  return;
2587 
2588  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2589 
2590  if (apply)
2591  {
2592  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
2593 
2594  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
2595  // Stop cast only spells vs PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE
2596  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
2597  if (Spell* spell = target->GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
2598  if (spell->m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE)
2599  // Stop spells on prepare or casting state
2600  target->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
2601  }
2602  else
2603  {
2604  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2605  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SILENCE) || target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE))
2606  return;
2607 
2608  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
2609  }
2610 }
2611 
2612 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModPacify(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2613 {
2614  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2615  return;
2616 
2617  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2618 
2619  if (apply)
2620  {
2621  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
2622  //target->AttackStop(); // pussywizard: wtf? why having this flag prevents from being in combat? it should just prevent melee attack
2623  }
2624  else
2625  {
2626  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2627  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY) || target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE))
2628  return;
2629  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
2630  }
2631 }
2632 
2633 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModPacifyAndSilence(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2634 {
2635  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2636  return;
2637 
2638  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2639 
2640  if (!(apply))
2641  {
2642  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2643  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE))
2644  return;
2645  }
2646  HandleAuraModPacify(aurApp, mode, apply);
2647  HandleAuraModSilence(aurApp, mode, apply);
2648 }
2649 
2650 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraAllowOnlyAbility(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2651 {
2652  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2653  return;
2654 
2655  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2656 
2657  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2658  {
2659  if (apply)
2660  target->SetFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY);
2661  else
2662  {
2663  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2664  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY))
2665  return;
2666  target->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY);
2667  }
2668  }
2669 }
2670 
2671 /****************************/
2672 /*** TRACKING ***/
2673 /****************************/
2674 
2675 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraTrackCreatures(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2676 {
2677  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2678  return;
2679 
2680  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2681 
2682  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2683  return;
2684 
2685  if (apply)
2686  target->SetFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_CREATURES, uint32(1) << (GetMiscValue() - 1));
2687  else
2688  target->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_CREATURES, uint32(1) << (GetMiscValue() - 1));
2689 }
2690 
2691 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraTrackResources(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2692 {
2693  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2694  return;
2695 
2696  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2697 
2698  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2699  return;
2700 
2701  if (apply)
2702  target->SetFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_RESOURCES, uint32(1) << (GetMiscValue() - 1));
2703  else
2704  target->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_RESOURCES, uint32(1) << (GetMiscValue() - 1));
2705 }
2706 
2707 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraTrackStealthed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2708 {
2709  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2710  return;
2711 
2712  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2713 
2714  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2715  return;
2716 
2717  if (!(apply))
2718  {
2719  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2720  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2721  return;
2722  }
2723  target->ApplyModFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE_TRACK_STEALTHED, apply);
2724 }
2725 
2726 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModStalked(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2727 {
2728  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2729  return;
2730 
2731  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2732 
2733  // used by spells: Hunter's Mark, Mind Vision, Syndicate Tracker (MURP) DND
2734  if (apply)
2735  target->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_TRACK_UNIT);
2736  else
2737  {
2738  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2739  if (!target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2740  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_TRACK_UNIT);
2741  }
2742 
2743  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
2744  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER);
2745 }
2746 
2747 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraUntrackable(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2748 {
2749  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2750  return;
2751 
2752  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2753 
2754  if (apply)
2755  target->SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_VIS_FLAG, UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_UNTRACKABLE);
2756  else
2757  {
2758  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2759  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2760  return;
2761  target->RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_VIS_FLAG, UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_UNTRACKABLE);
2762  }
2763 }
2764 
2765 /****************************/
2766 /*** SKILLS & TALENTS ***/
2767 /****************************/
2768 
2769 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModPetTalentsPoints(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
2770 {
2771  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
2772  return;
2773 
2774  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2775 
2776  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2777  return;
2778 
2779  // Recalculate pet talent points
2780  if (Pet* pet = target->ToPlayer()->GetPet())
2781  pet->InitTalentForLevel();
2782 }
2783 
2784 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModSkill(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2785 {
2786  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SKILL)))
2787  return;
2788  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2789 
2790  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2791  return;
2792 
2793  uint32 prot = GetMiscValue();
2794  int32 points = GetAmount();
2795 
2796  target->ToPlayer()->ModifySkillBonus(prot, ((apply) ? points : -points), GetAuraType() == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SKILL_TALENT);
2797  if (prot == SKILL_DEFENSE)
2798  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateDefenseBonusesMod();
2799 }
2800 
2801 /****************************/
2802 /*** MOVEMENT ***/
2803 /****************************/
2804 
2805 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraMounted(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2806 {
2807  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2808  return;
2809 
2810  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2811 
2812  if (apply)
2813  {
2814  uint32 creatureEntry = GetMiscValue();
2815 
2816  // Festive Holiday Mount
2817  if (target->HasAura(62061))
2818  {
2819  if (GetBase()->HasEffectType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED))
2820  creatureEntry = 24906;
2821  else
2822  creatureEntry = 15665;
2823  }
2824 
2825  CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(creatureEntry);
2826  if (!ci)
2827  {
2828  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "AuraMounted: `creature_template`='%u' not found in database (only need its modelid)", GetMiscValue());
2829  return;
2830  }
2831 
2832  uint32 displayID = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(ci);
2833  sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID);
2834 
2835  //some spell has one aura of mount and one of vehicle
2836  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2837  if (GetSpellInfo()->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON
2838  && GetSpellInfo()->Effects[i].MiscValue == GetMiscValue())
2839  displayID = 0;
2840 
2841  target->Mount(displayID, ci->VehicleId, GetMiscValue());
2842  }
2843  else
2844  {
2845  target->Dismount();
2846  //some mounts like Headless Horseman's Mount or broom stick are skill based spell
2847  // need to remove ALL arura related to mounts, this will stop client crash with broom stick
2848  // and never endless flying after using Headless Horseman's Mount
2849  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL)
2850  target->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED);
2851  }
2852 }
2853 
2854 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraAllowFlight(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2855 {
2856  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2857  return;
2858 
2859  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2860 
2861  if (!apply)
2862  {
2863  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2864  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()) || target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED))
2865  return;
2866  }
2867 
2868  target->SetCanFly(apply);
2869 
2870  if (!apply && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !target->IsLevitating())
2871  target->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall();
2872 }
2873 
2874 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraWaterWalk(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2875 {
2876  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2877  return;
2878 
2879  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2880 
2881  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
2882  {
2883  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
2884  }
2885 
2886  if (!apply)
2887  {
2888  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2889  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2890  return;
2891  }
2892 
2893  target->SetWaterWalking(apply);
2894 }
2895 
2896 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraFeatherFall(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2897 {
2898  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2899  return;
2900 
2901  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2902 
2903  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
2904  {
2905  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
2906  }
2907 
2908  if (!apply)
2909  {
2910  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2911  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2912  return;
2913  }
2914 
2915  target->SetFeatherFall(apply);
2916 
2917  // start fall from current height
2918  if (!apply && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2919  target->ToPlayer()->SetFallInformation(time(nullptr), target->GetPositionZ());
2920 }
2921 
2922 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraHover(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2923 {
2924  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2925  return;
2926 
2927  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2928 
2929  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
2930  {
2931  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
2932  }
2933 
2934  if (!apply)
2935  {
2936  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2937  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2938  return;
2939  }
2940 
2941  target->SetHover(apply);
2942 }
2943 
2944 void AuraEffect::HandleWaterBreathing(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
2945 {
2946  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2947  return;
2948 
2949  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2950 
2951  // update timers in client
2952  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2953  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateMirrorTimers();
2954 }
2955 
2956 void AuraEffect::HandleForceMoveForward(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2957 {
2958  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
2959  return;
2960 
2961  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2962 
2963  if (apply)
2964  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVEMENT);
2965  else
2966  {
2967  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
2968  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
2969  return;
2970  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVEMENT);
2971  }
2972 }
2973 
2974 /****************************/
2975 /*** THREAT ***/
2976 /****************************/
2977 
2978 void AuraEffect::HandleModThreat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2979 {
2980  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
2981  return;
2982 
2983  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2984  for (int8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
2985  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << i))
2986  ApplyPercentModFloatVar(target->m_threatModifier[i], float(GetAmount()), apply);
2987 }
2988 
2989 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModTotalThreat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
2990 {
2991  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
2992  return;
2993 
2994  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
2995 
2996  if (!target->IsAlive() || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2997  return;
2998 
2999  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3000  if (caster && caster->IsAlive())
3001  target->getHostileRefMgr().addTempThreat((float)GetAmount(), apply);
3002 }
3003 
3004 void AuraEffect::HandleModTaunt(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3005 {
3006  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3007  return;
3008 
3009  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3010 
3011  if (!target->IsAlive() || !target->CanHaveThreatList())
3012  return;
3013 
3014  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3015  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive())
3016  return;
3017 
3018  if (apply)
3019  target->TauntApply(caster);
3020  else
3021  {
3022  // When taunt aura fades out, mob will switch to previous target if current has less than 1.1 * secondthreat
3023  target->TauntFadeOut(caster);
3024  }
3025 }
3026 
3027 /*****************************/
3028 /*** CONTROL ***/
3029 /*****************************/
3030 
3031 void AuraEffect::HandleModConfuse(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3032 {
3033  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3034  return;
3035 
3036  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3037 
3038  target->SetControlled(apply, UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED);
3039 }
3040 
3041 void AuraEffect::HandleModFear(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3042 {
3043  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3044  return;
3045 
3046  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3047 
3048  target->SetControlled(apply, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING);
3049 }
3050 
3051 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModStun(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3052 {
3053  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3054  return;
3055 
3056  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3057 
3058  target->SetControlled(apply, UNIT_STATE_STUNNED);
3059 }
3060 
3061 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModRoot(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3062 {
3063  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3064  return;
3065 
3066  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3067 
3068  target->SetControlled(apply, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
3069 }
3070 
3071 void AuraEffect::HandlePreventFleeing(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3072 {
3073  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3074  return;
3075 
3076  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3077  // Since patch 3.0.2 this mechanic no longer affects fear effects. It will ONLY prevent humanoids from fleeing due to low health.
3078  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || !apply || target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR))
3079  return;
3082  target->SetControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING);
3083 }
3084 
3085 /***************************/
3086 /*** CHARM ***/
3087 /***************************/
3088 
3089 void AuraEffect::HandleModPossess(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3090 {
3091  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3092  return;
3093 
3094  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3095 
3096  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3097 
3098  // no support for posession AI yet
3099  if (caster && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3100  {
3101  HandleModCharm(aurApp, mode, apply);
3102  return;
3103  }
3104 
3105  if (apply)
3106  target->SetCharmedBy(caster, CHARM_TYPE_POSSESS, aurApp);
3107  else
3108  target->RemoveCharmedBy(caster);
3109 }
3110 
3111 void AuraEffect::HandleModPossessPet(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3112 {
3113  // Used by spell "Eyes of the Beast"
3114 
3115  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3116  return;
3117 
3118  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3119  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3120  return;
3121 
3122  //seems it may happen that when removing it is no longer owner's pet
3123  //if (caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet() != target)
3124  // return;
3125 
3126  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3127  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !target->IsPet())
3128  return;
3129 
3130  Pet* pet = target->ToPet();
3131 
3132  if (apply)
3133  {
3134  if (caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet() != pet)
3135  return;
3136 
3137  // Must clear current motion or pet leashes back to owner after a few yards
3138  // when under spell 'Eyes of the Beast'
3139  pet->GetMotionMaster()->Clear();
3140  pet->SetCharmedBy(caster, CHARM_TYPE_POSSESS, aurApp);
3141  }
3142  else
3143  {
3144  pet->RemoveCharmedBy(caster);
3145 
3146  if (!pet->IsWithinDistInMap(caster, pet->GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange()))
3147  pet->Remove(PET_SAVE_NOT_IN_SLOT, true);
3148  else
3149  {
3150  // Reinitialize the pet bar or it will appear greyed out
3151  caster->ToPlayer()->PetSpellInitialize();
3152 
3153  // Follow owner only if not fighting or owner didn't click "stay" at new location
3154  // This may be confusing because pet bar shows "stay" when under the spell but it retains
3155  // the "follow" flag. Player MUST click "stay" while under the spell.
3156  if (!pet->GetVictim() && !pet->GetCharmInfo()->HasCommandState(COMMAND_STAY))
3157  {
3158  pet->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(caster, PET_FOLLOW_DIST, pet->GetFollowAngle());
3159  }
3160  }
3161  }
3162 }
3163 
3164 void AuraEffect::HandleModCharm(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3165 {
3166  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3167  return;
3168 
3169  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3170 
3171  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3172 
3173  if (apply)
3174  target->SetCharmedBy(caster, CHARM_TYPE_CHARM, aurApp);
3175  else
3176  target->RemoveCharmedBy(caster);
3177 }
3178 
3179 void AuraEffect::HandleCharmConvert(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3180 {
3181  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3182  return;
3183 
3184  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3185 
3186  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3187 
3188  if (apply)
3189  target->SetCharmedBy(caster, CHARM_TYPE_CONVERT, aurApp);
3190  else
3191  target->RemoveCharmedBy(caster);
3192 }
3193 
3198 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraControlVehicle(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3199 {
3200  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
3201  return;
3202 
3203  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3204 
3205  if (!target->IsVehicle())
3206  return;
3207 
3208  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3209 
3210  if (!caster || caster == target)
3211  return;
3212 
3213  if (apply)
3214  {
3215  // Currently spells that have base points 0 and DieSides 0 = "0/0" exception are pushed to -1,
3216  // however the idea of 0/0 is to ingore flag VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_CAN_ENTER_OR_EXIT and -1 checks for it,
3217  // so this break such spells or most of them.
3218  // Current formula about m_amount: effect base points + dieside - 1
3219  // TO DO: Reasearch more about 0/0 and fix it.
3220  caster->_EnterVehicle(target->GetVehicleKit(), m_amount - 1, aurApp);
3221  }
3222  else
3223  {
3224  if (GetId() == 53111) // Devour Humanoid
3225  {
3226  Unit::Kill(target, caster);
3227  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3228  caster->ToCreature()->RemoveCorpse();
3229  }
3230 
3231  caster->_ExitVehicle();
3232  // some SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE auras have a dummy effect on the player - remove them
3233  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
3234  }
3235 }
3236 
3237 /*********************************************************/
3238 /*** MODIFY SPEED ***/
3239 /*********************************************************/
3240 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
3241 {
3242  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
3243  return;
3244 
3245  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3246 
3247  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
3248 
3249  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
3250  {
3251  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
3252  }
3253 }
3254 
3255 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseMountedSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3256 {
3257  HandleAuraModIncreaseSpeed(aurApp, mode, apply);
3258 }
3259 
3260 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3261 {
3262  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
3263  return;
3264 
3265  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3266  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK)
3267  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, true);
3268 
3270  if (GetAuraType() == SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED)
3271  {
3272  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
3273  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK && (apply || (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED) && !target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_FLY))))
3274  {
3275  target->SetCanFly(apply);
3276 
3277  if (!apply && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !target->IsLevitating())
3278  target->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall();
3279  }
3280 
3282  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL)
3283  {
3284  //Players on flying mounts must be immune to polymorph
3285  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3286  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3287 
3288  // Dragonmaw Illusion (overwrite mount model, mounted aura already applied)
3289  if (apply && target->HasAuraEffect(42016, 0) && target->GetMountID())
3290  target->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, 16314);
3291  }
3292  }
3293 
3294  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
3295  {
3296  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
3297  }
3298 }
3299 
3300 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseSwimSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
3301 {
3302  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
3303  return;
3304 
3305  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3306 
3307  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, true);
3308 
3309  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
3310  {
3311  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
3312  }
3313 }
3314 
3315 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModDecreaseSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
3316 {
3317  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
3318  return;
3319 
3320  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3321 
3322  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_WALK, true);
3323  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
3324  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, true);
3325  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, true);
3326  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN_BACK, true);
3327  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM_BACK, true);
3328  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT_BACK, true);
3329 
3330  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
3331  {
3332  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
3333  }
3334 }
3335 
3336 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModUseNormalSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
3337 {
3338  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3339  return;
3340 
3341  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3342 
3343  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
3344  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, true);
3345  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, true);
3346 
3347  if (Player* targetPlayer = target->ToPlayer())
3348  {
3349  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(targetPlayer);
3350  }
3351 }
3352 
3353 /*********************************************************/
3354 /*** IMMUNITY ***/
3355 /*********************************************************/
3356 
3357 void AuraEffect::HandleModStateImmunityMask(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3358 {
3359  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3360  return;
3361 
3362  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3363  std::list <AuraType> aura_immunity_list;
3364  uint32 mechanic_immunity_list = 0;
3365  int32 miscVal = GetMiscValue();
3366 
3367  switch (miscVal)
3368  {
3369  case 96:
3370  case 1615:
3371  {
3372  if (!GetAmount())
3373  {
3374  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_ROOT)
3375  | (1 << MECHANIC_FEAR) | (1 << MECHANIC_STUN)
3376  | (1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP) | (1 << MECHANIC_CHARM)
3377  | (1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR)
3378  | (1 << MECHANIC_POLYMORPH) | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED)
3379  | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_TURN);
3380 
3381  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3382  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3383  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3384  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3385  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3386  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SLEEP, apply);
3387  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SAPPED, apply);
3388  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_HORROR, apply);
3389  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3390  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3391  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3392  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_TURN, apply);
3393  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM);
3394  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3395  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3396  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
3397  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE);
3398  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
3399  }
3400  break;
3401  }
3402  case 679:
3403  {
3404  if (GetId() == 57742)
3405  {
3406  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_ROOT)
3407  | (1 << MECHANIC_FEAR) | (1 << MECHANIC_STUN)
3408  | (1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP) | (1 << MECHANIC_CHARM)
3409  | (1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR)
3410  | (1 << MECHANIC_POLYMORPH) | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED)
3411  | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_TURN);
3412 
3413  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3414  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3415  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3416  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3417  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SLEEP, apply);
3418  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3419  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SAPPED, apply);
3420  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_HORROR, apply);
3421  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3422  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3423  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3424  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_TURN, apply);
3425  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3426  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3427  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
3428  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE);
3429  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
3430  }
3431  break;
3432  }
3433  case 1557:
3434  {
3435  if (GetId() == 64187)
3436  {
3437  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_STUN);
3438  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3439  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3440  }
3441  else
3442  {
3443  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_ROOT)
3444  | (1 << MECHANIC_FEAR) | (1 << MECHANIC_STUN)
3445  | (1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP) | (1 << MECHANIC_CHARM)
3446  | (1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR)
3447  | (1 << MECHANIC_POLYMORPH) | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED)
3448  | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_TURN);
3449 
3450  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3451  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3452  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3453  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3454  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SLEEP, apply);
3455  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3456  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SAPPED, apply);
3457  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_HORROR, apply);
3458  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3459  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3460  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3461  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_TURN, apply);
3462  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3463  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3464  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
3465  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE);
3466  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
3467  }
3468  break;
3469  }
3470  case 1614:
3471  case 1694:
3472  {
3473  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, apply);
3474  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT);
3475  break;
3476  }
3477  case 1630:
3478  {
3479  if (!GetAmount())
3480  {
3481  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_ATTACK_ME, apply);
3482  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT);
3483  }
3484  else
3485  {
3486  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_ROOT)
3487  | (1 << MECHANIC_FEAR) | (1 << MECHANIC_STUN)
3488  | (1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP) | (1 << MECHANIC_CHARM)
3489  | (1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR)
3490  | (1 << MECHANIC_POLYMORPH) | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED)
3491  | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_TURN);
3492 
3493  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3494  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3495  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3496  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3497  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SLEEP, apply);
3498  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3499  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SAPPED, apply);
3500  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_HORROR, apply);
3501  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3502  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3503  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3504  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_TURN, apply);
3505  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3506  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3507  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
3508  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE);
3509  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
3510  }
3511  break;
3512  }
3513  case 477:
3514  case 1733:
3515  case 1632:
3516  {
3517  if (!GetAmount())
3518  {
3519  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_ROOT)
3520  | (1 << MECHANIC_FEAR) | (1 << MECHANIC_STUN)
3521  | (1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP) | (1 << MECHANIC_CHARM)
3522  | (1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR)
3523  | (1 << MECHANIC_POLYMORPH) | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED)
3524  | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_TURN) | (1 << MECHANIC_BANISH);
3525 
3526  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3527  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3528  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3529  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3530  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SLEEP, apply);
3531  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3532  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SAPPED, apply);
3533  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_HORROR, apply);
3534  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3535  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3536  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3537  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_TURN, apply);
3538  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_BANISH, apply);
3539  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_KNOCK_BACK, apply);
3540  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_KNOCK_BACK_DEST, apply);
3541  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3542 
3543  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3544  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
3545  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE);
3546  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
3547  }
3548  break;
3549  }
3550  case 878:
3551  {
3552  if (GetAmount() == 1)
3553  {
3554  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_STUN)
3555  | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED) | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE);
3556 
3557  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3558  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3559  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3560  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3561  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3562  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3563  }
3564  break;
3565  }
3566  default:
3567  break;
3568  }
3569 
3570  if (aura_immunity_list.empty())
3571  {
3572  // Roots, OK
3573  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 0))
3574  {
3575  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE);
3576 
3577  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3578  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
3579  }
3580  // Taunt, OK
3581  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 1))
3582  {
3583  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT);
3584  }
3585  // Crowd-Control auras?
3586  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 2))
3587  {
3588  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_POLYMORPH) | (1 << MECHANIC_DISORIENTED);
3589 
3590  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3591  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3592  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE);
3593  }
3594  // Interrupt, OK
3595  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 3))
3596  {
3597  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_INTERRUPT);
3598 
3599  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_INTERRUPT, apply);
3600  }
3601  // Transform?
3602  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 4))
3603  {
3604  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_TRANSFORM);
3605  }
3606  // Stun auras breakable by damage (Incapacitate effects), OK
3607  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 5))
3608  {
3609  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_KNOCKOUT);
3610 
3611  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_KNOCKOUT, apply);
3612  }
3613  // // Slowing effects
3614  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 6))
3615  {
3616  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE);
3617 
3618  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3619  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
3620  }
3621  // Charm auras?, 90%
3622  if ((GetMiscValue() & (1 << 7)))
3623  {
3624  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_CHARM);
3625 
3626  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3627  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM);
3628  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS);
3629  }
3630  // UNK
3631  // if ((GetMiscValue() & (1 << 8)))
3632  // {
3633  // }
3634  // Fear, OK
3635  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 9))
3636  {
3637  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_FEAR);
3638 
3639  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3640  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
3641  }
3642  // Stuns, OK
3643  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << 10))
3644  {
3645  mechanic_immunity_list = (1 << MECHANIC_STUN);
3646 
3647  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3648  aura_immunity_list.push_back(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3649  }
3650  }
3651 
3652  // apply immunities
3653  for (std::list <AuraType>::iterator iter = aura_immunity_list.begin(); iter != aura_immunity_list.end(); ++iter)
3654  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_STATE, *iter, apply);
3655 
3656  // Patch 3.0.3 Bladestorm now breaks all snares and roots on the warrior when activated.
3657  if (GetId() == 46924)
3658  {
3659  if (apply)
3660  {
3661  target->resetAttackTimer();
3662  target->resetAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK);
3663  }
3664 
3665  // Knockback and hex
3666  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_EFFECT, SPELL_EFFECT_KNOCK_BACK, apply);
3667  }
3668 
3669  if (apply && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
3670  {
3671  target->RemoveAurasWithMechanic(mechanic_immunity_list, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT, GetId());
3672  for (std::list <AuraType>::iterator iter = aura_immunity_list.begin(); iter != aura_immunity_list.end(); ++iter)
3673  target->RemoveAurasByType(*iter);
3674  }
3675 }
3676 
3677 void AuraEffect::HandleModMechanicImmunity(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3678 {
3679  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3680  return;
3681 
3682  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3683  uint32 mechanic = 0;
3684 
3685  switch (GetId())
3686  {
3687  case 46924: // BladeStorm
3688  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3689  break;
3690  case 34471: // The Beast Within
3691  case 19574: // Bestial Wrath
3692  mechanic = IMMUNE_TO_MOVEMENT_IMPAIRMENT_AND_LOSS_CONTROL_MASK;
3693  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_CHARM, apply);
3694  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DISORIENTED, apply);
3695  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FEAR, apply);
3696  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3697  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SLEEP, apply);
3698  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3699  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3700  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_FREEZE, apply);
3701  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_KNOCKOUT, apply);
3702  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
3703  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_BANISH, apply);
3704  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SHACKLE, apply);
3705  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_TURN, apply);
3706  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_HORROR, apply);
3707  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_DAZE, apply);
3708  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SAPPED, apply);
3709  break;
3710  case 42292: // PvP trinket
3711  case 59752: // Every Man for Himself
3712  case 65547: // PvP trinket for Faction Champions (ToC 25)
3713  case 53490: // Bullheaded
3714  case 46227: // Medalion of Immunity
3715  mechanic = IMMUNE_TO_MOVEMENT_IMPAIRMENT_AND_LOSS_CONTROL_MASK;
3716  target->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENTS_FLEEING); // xinef: Patch 2.3.0 PvP Trinkets: Insignia of the Alliance, Insignia of the Horde, Medallion of the Alliance, and Medallion of the Horde now clear the debuff from Judgement of Justice.
3717  // Actually we should apply immunities here, too, but the aura has only 100 ms duration, so there is practically no point
3718  break;
3719  case 54508: // Demonic Empowerment
3720  mechanic = (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE) | (1 << MECHANIC_ROOT);
3721  target->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
3722  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_SNARE, apply);
3723  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_ROOT, apply);
3724  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_STUN, apply);
3725  break;
3726  default:
3727  if (GetMiscValue() < 1)
3728  return;
3729  mechanic = 1 << GetMiscValue();
3730  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, GetMiscValue(), apply);
3731  break;
3732  }
3733 
3734  if (apply && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
3735  {
3736  // Xinef: exception for purely snare mechanic (eg. hands of freedom)!
3737  if (mechanic == (1 << MECHANIC_SNARE))
3738  target->RemoveMovementImpairingAuras(false);
3739  else
3740  target->RemoveAurasWithMechanic(mechanic, AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT, GetId());
3741  }
3742 }
3743 
3744 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModEffectImmunity(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3745 {
3746  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3747  return;
3748 
3749  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3750 
3751  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_EFFECT, GetMiscValue(), apply);
3752 
3753  // when removing flag aura, handle flag drop
3754  Player* player = target->ToPlayer();
3755  if (!apply && player && (GetSpellInfo()->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION))
3756  {
3757  if (player->InBattleground())
3758  {
3759  if (Battleground* bg = player->GetBattleground())
3760  bg->EventPlayerDroppedFlag(player);
3761  }
3762  else
3763  sOutdoorPvPMgr->HandleDropFlag(player, GetSpellInfo()->Id);
3764  }
3765 }
3766 
3767 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModStateImmunity(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3768 {
3769  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3770  return;
3771 
3772  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3773 
3774  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_STATE, GetMiscValue(), apply);
3775 
3776  if (apply && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
3777  target->RemoveAurasByType(AuraType(GetMiscValue()), ObjectGuid::Empty, GetBase());
3778 }
3779 
3780 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModSchoolImmunity(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3781 {
3782  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3783  return;
3784 
3785  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3786 
3787  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, GetMiscValue(), (apply));
3788 
3789  if (GetSpellInfo()->Mechanic == MECHANIC_BANISH)
3790  {
3791  if (apply)
3792  target->AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED);
3793  else
3794  {
3795  bool banishFound = false;
3796  Unit::AuraEffectList const& banishAuras = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(GetAuraType());
3797  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = banishAuras.begin(); i != banishAuras.end(); ++i)
3798  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->Mechanic == MECHANIC_BANISH)
3799  {
3800  banishFound = true;
3801  break;
3802  }
3803  if (!banishFound)
3804  target->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED);
3805  }
3806  }
3807 
3808  if (apply && GetMiscValue() == SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
3809  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
3810 
3811  // remove all flag auras (they are positive, but they must be removed when you are immune)
3812  if (GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT)
3813  && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_FAIL_ON_ALL_TARGETS_IMMUNE))
3814  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_IMMUNE_OR_LOST_SELECTION);
3815 
3816  // TODO: optimalize this cycle - use RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags call or something else
3817  if ((apply)
3818  && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT)
3819  && GetSpellInfo()->IsPositive()) //Only positive immunity removes auras
3820  {
3821  uint32 school_mask = GetMiscValue();
3822  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& Auras = target->GetAppliedAuras();
3823  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator iter = Auras.begin(); iter != Auras.end();)
3824  {
3825  SpellInfo const* spell = iter->second->GetBase()->GetSpellInfo();
3826  if ((spell->GetSchoolMask() & school_mask)//Check for school mask
3827  && GetSpellInfo()->CanDispelAura(spell)
3828  && !iter->second->IsPositive() //Don't remove positive spells
3829  && spell->Id != GetId()) //Don't remove self
3830  {
3831  target->RemoveAura(iter);
3832  }
3833  else
3834  ++iter;
3835  }
3836  }
3837 }
3838 
3839 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModDmgImmunity(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3840 {
3841  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3842  return;
3843 
3844  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3845 
3846  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_DAMAGE, GetMiscValue(), apply);
3847 }
3848 
3849 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModDispelImmunity(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3850 {
3851  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
3852  return;
3853 
3854  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3855 
3856  target->ApplySpellDispelImmunity(m_spellInfo, DispelType(GetMiscValue()), (apply));
3857 }
3858 
3859 /*********************************************************/
3860 /*** MODIFY STATS ***/
3861 /*********************************************************/
3862 
3863 /********************************/
3864 /*** RESISTANCE ***/
3865 /********************************/
3866 
3867 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModResistanceExclusive(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3868 {
3869  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
3870  return;
3871 
3872  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3873 
3874  for (int8 x = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; x < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; x++)
3875  {
3876  if (GetMiscValue() & int32(1 << x))
3877  {
3878  int32 amount = target->GetMaxPositiveAuraModifierByMiscMask(SPELL_AURA_MOD_RESISTANCE_EXCLUSIVE, 1 << x, this);
3879  if (amount < GetAmount())
3880  {
3881  float value = float(GetAmount() - amount);
3882  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + x), BASE_VALUE, value, apply);
3883  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3884  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsMod(SpellSchools(x), aurApp->IsPositive(), value, apply);
3885  }
3886  }
3887  }
3888 }
3889 
3890 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModResistance(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3891 {
3892  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
3893  return;
3894 
3895  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3896 
3897  for (int8 x = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; x < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; x++)
3898  {
3899  if (GetMiscValue() & int32(1 << x))
3900  {
3901  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + x), TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
3902  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet())
3903  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsMod(SpellSchools(x), GetAmount() > 0, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
3904  }
3905  }
3906 }
3907 
3908 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModBaseResistancePCT(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3909 {
3910  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
3911  return;
3912 
3913  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3914 
3915  // only players have base stats
3916  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3917  {
3918  //pets only have base armor
3919  if (target->IsPet() && (GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL))
3920  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ARMOR, BASE_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
3921  }
3922  else
3923  {
3924  for (int8 x = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; x < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; x++)
3925  {
3926  if (GetMiscValue() & int32(1 << x))
3927  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + x), BASE_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
3928  }
3929  }
3930 }
3931 
3932 void AuraEffect::HandleModResistancePercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3933 {
3934  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
3935  return;
3936 
3937  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3938 
3939  for (int8 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; i++)
3940  {
3941  if (GetMiscValue() & int32(1 << i))
3942  {
3943  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
3944  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet())
3945  {
3946  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsPercentMod(SpellSchools(i), true, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
3947  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsPercentMod(SpellSchools(i), false, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
3948  }
3949  }
3950  }
3951 }
3952 
3953 void AuraEffect::HandleModBaseResistance(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3954 {
3955  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
3956  return;
3957 
3958  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3959 
3960  // only players have base stats
3961  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3962  {
3963  //only pets have base stats
3964  if (target->IsPet() && (GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL))
3965  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ARMOR, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
3966  }
3967  else
3968  {
3969  for (int i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; i++)
3970  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << i))
3971  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
3972  }
3973 }
3974 
3975 void AuraEffect::HandleModTargetResistance(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3976 {
3977  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
3978  return;
3979 
3980  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
3981 
3982  // applied to damage as HandleNoImmediateEffect in Unit::CalcAbsorbResist and Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage
3983 
3984  // show armor penetration
3985  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL))
3986  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_TARGET_PHYSICAL_RESISTANCE, GetAmount(), apply);
3987 
3988  // show as spell penetration only full spell penetration bonuses (all resistances except armor and holy
3989  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_SPELL) == SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_SPELL)
3990  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_TARGET_RESISTANCE, GetAmount(), apply);
3991 }
3992 
3993 /********************************/
3994 /*** STAT ***/
3995 /********************************/
3996 
3997 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModStat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
3998 {
3999  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4000  return;
4001 
4002  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4003 
4004  if (GetMiscValue() < -2 || GetMiscValue() > 4)
4005  {
4006  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "WARNING: Spell %u effect %u has an unsupported misc value (%i) for SPELL_AURA_MOD_STAT ", GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetMiscValue());
4007  return;
4008  }
4009 
4010  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; i++)
4011  {
4012  // -1 or -2 is all stats (misc < -2 checked in function beginning)
4013  if (GetMiscValue() < 0 || GetMiscValue() == i)
4014  {
4015  //target->ApplyStatMod(Stats(i), m_amount, apply);
4016  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4017  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet())
4018  target->ApplyStatBuffMod(Stats(i), (float)GetAmount(), apply);
4019  }
4020  }
4021 }
4022 
4023 void AuraEffect::HandleModPercentStat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4024 {
4025  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4026  return;
4027 
4028  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4029 
4030  if (GetMiscValue() < -1 || GetMiscValue() > 4)
4031  {
4032  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "WARNING: Misc Value for SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERCENT_STAT not valid");
4033  return;
4034  }
4035 
4036  // only players have base stats
4037  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4038  return;
4039 
4040  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; ++i)
4041  {
4042  if (GetMiscValue() == i || GetMiscValue() == -1)
4043  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), BASE_PCT, float(m_amount), apply);
4044  }
4045 }
4046 
4047 void AuraEffect::HandleModSpellDamagePercentFromStat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4048 {
4049  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4050  return;
4051 
4052  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4053 
4054  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4055  return;
4056 
4057  // Magic damage modifiers implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonus
4058  // This information for client side use only
4059  // Recalculate bonus
4060  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateSpellDamageAndHealingBonus();
4061 }
4062 
4063 void AuraEffect::HandleModSpellHealingPercentFromStat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4064 {
4065  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4066  return;
4067 
4068  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4069 
4070  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4071  return;
4072 
4073  // Recalculate bonus
4074  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateSpellDamageAndHealingBonus();
4075 }

4085  return;

4091 }

4099

4107 void AuraEffect::HandleModHealingDone(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4108 {

4110  return;

4113 
4114  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4115  return;
4116  // implemented in Unit::SpellHealingBonus
4117  // this information is for client side only
4118  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateSpellDamageAndHealingBonus();
4119 }
4120 
4121 void AuraEffect::HandleModTotalPercentStat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4122 {
4123  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4124  return;
4125 
4126  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4127 
4128  if (GetMiscValue() < -1 || GetMiscValue() > 4)
4129  {
4130  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "WARNING: Misc Value for SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERCENT_STAT not valid");
4131  return;
4132  }
4133 
4134  // save current health state
4135  float healthPct = target->GetHealthPct();
4136  bool alive = target->IsAlive();
4137  float value = GetAmount();
4138 
4139  if (GetId() == 67480) // xinef: hack fix for blessing of sanctuary stats stack with blessing of kings...
4140  {
4141  if (value) // not turned off
4142  value = 10.0f;
4143  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; i++)
4144  {
4145  if (i == STAT_STRENGTH || i == STAT_STAMINA)
4146  {
4147  if (apply && (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet()))
4148  target->ApplyStatPercentBuffMod(Stats(i), value, apply);
4149 
4150  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), TOTAL_PCT, value, apply);
4151 
4152  if (!apply && (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet()))
4153  target->ApplyStatPercentBuffMod(Stats(i), value, apply);
4154  }
4155  }
4156  return;
4157  }
4158 
4159  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; i++)
4160  {
4161  if (GetMiscValue() == i || GetMiscValue() == -1)
4162  {
4163  if (apply && (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet()))
4164  target->ApplyStatPercentBuffMod(Stats(i), value, apply);
4165 
4166  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), TOTAL_PCT, value, apply);
4167 
4168  if (!apply && (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || target->IsPet()))
4169  target->ApplyStatPercentBuffMod(Stats(i), value, apply);
4170  }
4171  }
4172 
4173  // recalculate current HP/MP after applying aura modifications (only for spells with SPELL_ATTR0_UNK4 0x00000010 flag)
4174  // this check is total bullshit i think
4175  if (GetMiscValue() == STAT_STAMINA && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_IS_ABILITY))
4176  target->SetHealth(std::max<uint32>(uint32(healthPct * target->GetMaxHealth() * 0.01f), (alive ? 1 : 0)));
4177 }
4178 
4179 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModResistenceOfStatPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4180 {
4181  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4182  return;
4183 
4184  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4185 
4186  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4187  return;
4188 
4189  if (GetMiscValue() != SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
4190  {
4191  // support required adding replace UpdateArmor by loop by UpdateResistence at intellect update
4192  // and include in UpdateResistence same code as in UpdateArmor for aura mod apply.
4193  LOG_ERROR("spells.aura.effect", "Aura SPELL_AURA_MOD_RESISTANCE_OF_STAT_PERCENT(182) does not work for non-armor type resistances!");
4194  return;
4195  }
4196 
4197  // Recalculate Armor
4198  target->UpdateArmor();
4199 }
4200 
4201 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModExpertise(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4202 {
4203  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4204  return;
4205 
4206  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4207 
4208  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4209  return;
4210 
4211  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateExpertise(BASE_ATTACK);
4212  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateExpertise(OFF_ATTACK);
4213 }
4214 
4215 /********************************/
4216 /*** HEAL & ENERGIZE ***/
4217 /********************************/
4218 void AuraEffect::HandleModPowerRegen(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4219 {
4220  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4221  return;
4222 
4223  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4224 
4225  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4226  return;
4227 
4228  // Update manaregen value
4229  if (GetMiscValue() == POWER_MANA)
4230  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateManaRegen();
4231  else if (GetMiscValue() == POWER_RUNE)
4232  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateRuneRegen(RuneType(GetMiscValueB()));
4233  // other powers are not immediate effects - implemented in Player::Regenerate, Creature::Regenerate
4234 }
4235 
4236 void AuraEffect::HandleModPowerRegenPCT(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4237 {
4238  HandleModPowerRegen(aurApp, mode, apply);
4239 }
4240 
4241 void AuraEffect::HandleModManaRegen(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4242 {
4243  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4244  return;
4245 
4246  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4247 
4248  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4249  return;
4250 
4251  //Note: an increase in regen does NOT cause threat.
4252  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateManaRegen();
4253 }
4254 
4255 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseHealth(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4256 {
4257  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4258  return;
4259 
4260  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4261 
4262  if (apply)
4263  {
4264  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4265  target->ModifyHealth(GetAmount());
4266  }
4267  else
4268  {
4269  if (int32(target->GetHealth()) > GetAmount())
4270  target->ModifyHealth(-GetAmount());
4271  else
4272  target->SetHealth(1);
4273  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4274  }
4275 }
4276 
4277 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseMaxHealth(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4278 {
4279  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4280  return;
4281 
4282  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4283 
4284  uint32 oldhealth = target->GetHealth();
4285  double healthPercentage = (double)oldhealth / (double)target->GetMaxHealth();
4286 
4287  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4288 
4289  // refresh percentage
4290  if (oldhealth > 0)
4291  {
4292  uint32 newhealth = uint32(ceil((double)target->GetMaxHealth() * healthPercentage));
4293  if (newhealth == 0)
4294  newhealth = 1;
4295 
4296  target->SetHealth(newhealth);
4297  }
4298 }
4299 
4300 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseEnergy(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4301 {
4302  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4303  return;
4304 
4305  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4306 
4307  Powers PowerType = Powers(GetMiscValue());
4308  // do not check power type, we can always modify the maximum
4309  // as the client will not see any difference
4310  // also, placing conditions that may change during the aura duration
4311  // inside effect handlers is not a good idea
4312  //if (int32(PowerType) != GetMiscValue())
4313  // return;
4314 
4315  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(static_cast<uint16>(UNIT_MOD_POWER_START) + PowerType);
4316 
4317  target->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4318 }
4319 
4320 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseEnergyPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4321 {
4322  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4323  return;
4324 
4325  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4326 
4327  Powers PowerType = Powers(GetMiscValue());
4328  // do not check power type, we can always modify the maximum
4329  // as the client will not see any difference
4330  // also, placing conditions that may change during the aura duration
4331  // inside effect handlers is not a good idea
4332  //if (int32(PowerType) != GetMiscValue())
4333  // return;
4334 
4335  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(static_cast<uint16>(UNIT_MOD_POWER_START) + PowerType);
4336  float amount = float(GetAmount());
4337 
4338  if (apply)
4339  {
4340  target->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT, amount, apply);
4341  target->ModifyPowerPct(PowerType, amount, apply);
4342  }
4343  else
4344  {
4345  target->ModifyPowerPct(PowerType, amount, apply);
4346  target->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT, amount, apply);
4347  }
4348 }
4349 
4350 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModIncreaseHealthPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4351 {
4352  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4353  return;
4354 
4355  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4356 
4357  // Unit will keep hp% after MaxHealth being modified if unit is alive.
4358  float percent = target->GetHealthPct();
4359  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4360 
4361  // Xinef: pct was rounded down and could "kill" creature by setting its health to 0 making npc zombie
4362  if (target->IsAlive())
4363  if (uint32 healthAmount = CalculatePct(target->GetMaxHealth(), percent))
4364  target->SetHealth(healthAmount);
4365 }
4366 
4367 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraIncreaseBaseHealthPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4368 {
4369  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4370  return;
4371 
4372  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4373 
4374  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, BASE_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4375 }
4376 
4377 /********************************/
4378 /*** FIGHT ***/
4379 /********************************/
4380 
4381 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModParryPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4382 {
4383  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4384  return;
4385 
4386  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4387 
4388  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4389  return;
4390 
4391  if (!target->ToPlayer()->CanParry())
4392  target->ToPlayer()->SetCanParry(true);
4393  else
4394  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateParryPercentage();
4395 }
4396

4398 {
4399  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4400  return;
4401 
4402  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4403 
4404  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4405  return;
4406 
4407  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateDodgePercentage();
4408 }

4410 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModBlockPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4411 {

4413  return;
4414 
4415  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4416 
4417  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4418  return;
4419 
4420  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateBlockPercentage();
4421 }

4423 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModRegenInterrupt(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4424 {
4425  HandleModManaRegen(aurApp, mode, apply);
4426 }
4427 
4428 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModWeaponCritPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4429 {
4430  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4431  return;
4432 
4433  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4434 
4435  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4436  return;
4437 
4438  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACK; ++i)
4439  if (Item* pItem = target->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(i), true))
4440  target->ToPlayer()->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraCritMod(pItem, WeaponAttackType(i), this, apply);
4441 
4442  // mods must be applied base at equipped weapon class and subclass comparison
4443  // with spell->EquippedItemClass and EquippedItemSubClassMask and EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask
4444  // GetMiscValue() comparison with item generated damage types
4445 
4446  if (GetSpellInfo()->EquippedItemClass == -1)
4447  {
4448  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4449  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(OFFHAND_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4450  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(RANGED_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4451  }
4452  else
4453  {
4454  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
4455  }
4456 }
4457 
4458 void AuraEffect::HandleModHitChance(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4459 {
4460  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4461  return;
4462 
4463  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4464 
4465  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4466  {
4467  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateMeleeHitChances();
4468  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateRangedHitChances();
4469  }
4470  else
4471  {
4472  target->m_modMeleeHitChance += (apply) ? GetAmount() : (-GetAmount());
4473  target->m_modRangedHitChance += (apply) ? GetAmount() : (-GetAmount());
4474  }
4475 }
4476 
4477 void AuraEffect::HandleModSpellHitChance(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4478 {
4479  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4480  return;
4481 
4482  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4483 
4484  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4485  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateSpellHitChances();
4486  else
4487  target->m_modSpellHitChance += (apply) ? GetAmount() : (-GetAmount());
4488 }
4489 
4490 void AuraEffect::HandleModSpellCritChance(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4491 {
4492  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4493  return;
4494 
4495  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4496 
4497  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4498  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateAllSpellCritChances();
4499  else
4500  target->m_baseSpellCritChance += (apply) ? GetAmount() : -GetAmount();
4501 }
4502 
4503 void AuraEffect::HandleModSpellCritChanceShool(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4504 {
4505  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4506  return;
4507 
4508  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4509 
4510  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4511  return;
4512 
4513  for (int school = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; school < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++school)
4514  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << school))
4515  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateSpellCritChance(school);
4516 }
4517 
4518 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModCritPct(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4519 {
4520  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4521  return;
4522 
4523  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4524 
4525  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4526  {
4527  target->m_baseSpellCritChance += (apply) ? GetAmount() : -GetAmount();
4528  return;
4529  }
4530 
4531  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4532  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(OFFHAND_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4533  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(RANGED_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4534 
4535  // included in Player::UpdateSpellCritChance calculation
4536  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateAllSpellCritChances();
4537 }
4538 
4539 /********************************/
4540 /*** ATTACK SPEED ***/
4541 /********************************/
4542 
4543 void AuraEffect::HandleModCastingSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4544 {
4545  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4546  return;
4547 
4548  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4549 
4550  // Xinef: Do not apply such auras in normal way
4551  if (GetAmount() >= 1000)
4552  {
4553  target->SetInstantCast(apply);
4554  return;
4555  }
4556 
4557  target->ApplyCastTimePercentMod((float)GetAmount(), apply);
4558 }
4559 
4560 void AuraEffect::HandleModMeleeRangedSpeedPct(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4561 {
4562  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4563  return;
4564 
4565  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4566 
4567  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
4568  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
4569  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
4570 }
4571 
4572 void AuraEffect::HandleModCombatSpeedPct(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4573 {
4574  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4575  return;
4576 
4577  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4578 
4579  target->ApplyCastTimePercentMod(float(GetAmount()), apply);
4580  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4581  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4582  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4583 }
4584 
4585 void AuraEffect::HandleModAttackSpeed(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4586 {
4587  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4588  return;

4590  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4591 
4592  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4593  target->UpdateDamagePhysical(BASE_ATTACK);
4594 }
4595 
4596 void AuraEffect::HandleModMeleeSpeedPct(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4597 {
4598  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4599  return;
4600 
4601  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4602 
4603  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4604  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4605 }
4606

4613

4615 }
4616

4618 {

4620  return;

4623 
4624  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4625  return;

4627  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, (float)GetAmount(), apply);
4628 }

4630 /********************************/
4631 /*** COMBAT RATING ***/
4632 /********************************/
4633 
4634 void AuraEffect::HandleModRating(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4635 {
4636  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4637  return;
4638 
4639  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4640 
4641  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4642  return;
4643 
4644  for (uint32 rating = 0; rating < MAX_COMBAT_RATING; ++rating)
4645  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << rating))
4646  target->ToPlayer()->ApplyRatingMod(CombatRating(rating), GetAmount(), apply);
4647 }
4648 
4649 void AuraEffect::HandleModRatingFromStat(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4650 {
4651  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4652  return;
4653 
4654  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4655 
4656  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4657  return;
4658 
4659  // Just recalculate ratings
4660  for (uint32 rating = 0; rating < MAX_COMBAT_RATING; ++rating)
4661  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << rating))
4662  target->ToPlayer()->ApplyRatingMod(CombatRating(rating), 0, apply);
4663 }
4664 
4665 /********************************/
4666 /*** ATTACK POWER ***/
4667 /********************************/
4668 
4669 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModAttackPower(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4670 {
4671  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4672  return;
4673 
4674  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4675 
4676  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4677 }
4678 
4679 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPower(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4680 {
4681  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4682  return;
4683 
4684  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4685 
4686  if ((target->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) != 0)
4687  return;
4688 
4689  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4690 }
4691 
4692 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModAttackPowerPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4693 {
4694  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4695  return;
4696 
4697  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4698 
4699  //UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER = multiplier - 1
4700  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4701 }
4702 
4703 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPowerPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4704 {
4705  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4706  return;
4707 
4708  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4709 
4710  if ((target->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) != 0)
4711  return;
4712 
4713  //UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER = multiplier - 1
4714  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4715 }
4716 
4717 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPowerOfStatPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4718 {
