4719  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4720  return;
4721 
4722  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4723 
4724  // Recalculate bonus
4725  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !(target->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS))
4726  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(true);
4727 }
4728 
4729 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfStatPercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4730 {
4731  HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfArmor(aurApp, mode, apply);
4732 }
4733 
4734 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfArmor(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4735 {
4736  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4737  return;
4738 
4739  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4740 
4741  // Recalculate bonus
4742  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4743  target->ToPlayer()->UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(false);
4744 }
4745 /********************************/
4746 /*** DAMAGE BONUS ***/
4747 /********************************/
4748 void AuraEffect::HandleModDamageDone(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4749 {
4750  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4751  return;
4752 
4753  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4754 
4755  // apply item specific bonuses for already equipped weapon
4756  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4757  {
4758  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACK; ++i)
4759  if (Item* pItem = target->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(i), true))
4760  target->ToPlayer()->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraDamageMod(pItem, WeaponAttackType(i), this, apply);
4761  }
4762 
4763  // GetMiscValue() is bitmask of spell schools
4764  // 1 (0-bit) - normal school damage (SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
4765  // 126 - full bitmask all magic damages (SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC) including wands
4766  // 127 - full bitmask any damages
4767  //
4768  // mods must be applied base at equipped weapon class and subclass comparison
4769  // with spell->EquippedItemClass and EquippedItemSubClassMask and EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask
4770  // GetMiscValue() comparison with item generated damage types
4771 
4772  if ((GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) != 0 && sScriptMgr->CanModAuraEffectDamageDone(this, target, aurApp, mode, apply))
4773  {
4774  // apply generic physical damage bonuses including wand case
4775  if (GetSpellInfo()->EquippedItemClass == -1 || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4776  {
4777  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4778  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4779  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED, TOTAL_VALUE, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4780 
4781  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4782  {
4783  if (GetAmount() > 0)
4784  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_POS, GetAmount(), apply);
4785  else
4786  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_NEG, GetAmount(), apply);
4787  }
4788  }
4789  else
4790  {
4791  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
4792  }
4793  }
4794 
4795  // Skip non magic case for Speedup
4796  if ((GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC) == 0)
4797  return;
4798 
4799  if (GetSpellInfo()->EquippedItemClass != -1 || GetSpellInfo()->EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask != 0)
4800  {
4801  // wand magic case (skip generic to all item spell bonuses)
4802  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
4803 
4804  // Skip item specific requirements for not wand magic damage
4805  return;
4806  }
4807 
4808  // Magic damage modifiers implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonus
4809  // This information for client side use only
4810  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4811  {
4812  if (GetAmount() > 0)
4813  {
4814  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; i++)
4815  {
4816  if ((GetMiscValue() & (1 << i)) != 0)
4817  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_POS + i, GetAmount(), apply);
4818  }
4819  }
4820  else
4821  {
4822  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; i++)
4823  {
4824  if ((GetMiscValue() & (1 << i)) != 0)
4825  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_NEG + i, GetAmount(), apply);
4826  }
4827  }
4828  if (Guardian* pet = target->ToPlayer()->GetGuardianPet())
4829  pet->UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage();
4830  }
4831 }
4832 
4833 void AuraEffect::HandleModDamagePercentDone(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4834 {
4835  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4836  return;
4837 
4838  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4839  if (!target)
4840  return;
4841 
4842  if (!sScriptMgr->CanModAuraEffectModDamagePercentDone(this, target, aurApp, mode, apply))
4843  return;
4844 
4845  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4846  {
4847  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACK; ++i)
4848  if (Item* item = target->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(i), false))
4849  target->ToPlayer()->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraDamageMod(item, WeaponAttackType(i), this, apply);
4850  }
4851 
4852  if ((GetMiscValue() & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) && (GetSpellInfo()->EquippedItemClass == -1 || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER))
4853  {
4854  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4855  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4856  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4857 
4858  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4859  target->ToPlayer()->ApplyPercentModFloatValue(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_PCT, float (GetAmount()), apply);
4860  }
4861  else
4862  {
4863  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods for SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL && EquippedItemClass != -1 and also for wand case
4864  }
4865 }
4866 
4867 void AuraEffect::HandleModOffhandDamagePercent(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4868 {
4869  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4870  return;
4871 
4872  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4873 
4874  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_PCT, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4875 }
4876 
4877 void AuraEffect::HandleShieldBlockValue(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4878 {
4879  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_STAT)))
4880  return;
4881 
4882  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4883 
4884  BaseModType modType = FLAT_MOD;
4885  if (GetAuraType() == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHIELD_BLOCKVALUE_PCT)
4886  modType = PCT_MOD;
4887 
4888  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4889  target->ToPlayer()->HandleBaseModValue(SHIELD_BLOCK_VALUE, modType, float(GetAmount()), apply);
4890 }
4891 
4892 /********************************/
4893 /*** POWER COST ***/
4894 /********************************/
4895 
4896 void AuraEffect::HandleModPowerCostPCT(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4897 {
4898  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
4899  return;
4900 
4901  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4902 
4903  float amount = CalculatePct(1.0f, GetAmount());
4904  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
4905  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << i))
4906  target->ApplyModSignedFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_POWER_COST_MULTIPLIER + i, amount, apply);
4907 }
4908 
4909 void AuraEffect::HandleModPowerCost(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4910 {
4911  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
4912  return;
4913 
4914  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4915 
4916  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
4917  if (GetMiscValue() & (1 << i))
4918  target->ApplyModInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_POWER_COST_MODIFIER + i, GetAmount(), apply);
4919 }
4920 
4921 void AuraEffect::HandleArenaPreparation(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4922 {
4923  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
4924  return;
4925 
4926  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4927 
4928  if (apply)
4929  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREPARATION);
4930  else
4931  {
4932  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
4933  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
4934  return;
4935  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREPARATION);
4936  }
4937 }
4938 
4939 void AuraEffect::HandleNoReagentUseAura(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool /*apply*/) const
4940 {
4941  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
4942  return;
4943 
4944  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4945 
4946  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4947  return;
4948 
4949  flag96 mask;
4950  Unit::AuraEffectList const& noReagent = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_NO_REAGENT_USE);
4951  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = noReagent.begin(); i != noReagent.end(); ++i)
4952  mask |= (*i)->m_spellInfo->Effects[(*i)->m_effIndex].SpellClassMask;
4953 
4954  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_NO_REAGENT_COST_1, mask[0]);
4955  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_NO_REAGENT_COST_1 + 1, mask[1]);
4956  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_NO_REAGENT_COST_1 + 2, mask[2]);
4957 }
4958 
4959 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraRetainComboPoints(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4960 {
4961  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
4962  return;
4963 
4964  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4965 
4966  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4967  return;
4968 
4969  // combo points was added in SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_COMBO_POINTS handler
4970  // remove only if aura expire by time (in case combo points amount change aura removed without combo points lost)
4971  if (!(apply) && GetBase()->GetDuration() == 0 && target->ToPlayer()->GetComboTarget())
4972  if (Unit* unit = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*target, target->ToPlayer()->GetComboTarget()))
4973  target->ToPlayer()->AddComboPoints(unit, -GetAmount());
4974 }
4975 
4976 /*********************************************************/
4977 /*** OTHERS ***/
4978 /*********************************************************/
4979 
4980 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraDummy(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
4981 {
4982  if (!(mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY)))
4983  return;
4984 
4985  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
4986 
4987  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4988 
4989  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL)
4990  {
4991  // pet auras
4992  if (PetAura const* petSpell = sSpellMgr->GetPetAura(GetId(), m_effIndex))
4993  {
4994  if (apply)
4995  target->AddPetAura(petSpell);
4996  else
4997  target->RemovePetAura(petSpell);
4998  }
4999  }
5000 
5001  if (mode & (AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL | AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY))
5002  {
5003  // AT APPLY
5004  if (apply)
5005  {
5006  switch (GetId())
5007  {
5008  case 1515: // Tame beast
5009  // FIX_ME: this is 2.0.12 threat effect replaced in 2.1.x by dummy aura, must be checked for correctness
5010  if (caster && target->CanHaveThreatList())
5011  target->AddThreat(caster, 10.0f);
5012  break;
5013  case 13139: // net-o-matic
5014  // root to self part of (root_target->charge->root_self sequence
5015  if (caster)
5016  caster->CastSpell(caster, 13138, true, nullptr, this);
5017  break;
5018  case 34026: // kill command
5019  {
5020  Unit* pet = target->GetGuardianPet();
5021  if (!pet)
5022  break;
5023 
5024  target->CastSpell(target, 34027, true, nullptr, this);
5025 
5026  // set 3 stacks and 3 charges (to make all auras not disappear at once)
5027  Aura* owner_aura = target->GetAura(34027, GetCasterGUID());
5028  Aura* pet_aura = pet->GetAura(58914, GetCasterGUID());
5029  if (owner_aura)
5030  {
5031  owner_aura->SetCharges(0);
5032  owner_aura->SetStackAmount(owner_aura->GetSpellInfo()->StackAmount);
5033  if (pet_aura)
5034  {
5035  pet_aura->SetCharges(0);
5036  pet_aura->SetStackAmount(owner_aura->GetSpellInfo()->StackAmount);
5037  }
5038  }
5039  break;
5040  }
5041  case 37096: // Blood Elf Illusion
5042  {
5043  if (caster)
5044  {
5045  switch (caster->getGender())
5046  {
5047  case GENDER_FEMALE:
5048  caster->CastSpell(target, 37095, true, nullptr, this); // Blood Elf Disguise
5049  break;
5050  case GENDER_MALE:
5051  caster->CastSpell(target, 37093, true, nullptr, this);
5052  break;
5053  default:
5054  break;
5055  }
5056  }
5057  break;
5058  }
5059  case 55198: // Tidal Force
5060  {
5061  target->CastSpell(target, 55166, true);
5062  if (Aura* owner_aura = target->GetAura(55166))
5063  owner_aura->SetStackAmount(owner_aura->GetSpellInfo()->StackAmount);
5064  return;
5065  }
5066  case 39850: // Rocket Blast
5067  if (roll_chance_i(20)) // backfire stun
5068  target->CastSpell(target, 51581, true, nullptr, this);
5069  break;
5070  case 43873: // Headless Horseman Laugh
5071  target->PlayDistanceSound(11965);
5072  break;
5073  case 46354: // Blood Elf Illusion
5074  if (caster)
5075  {
5076  switch (caster->getGender())
5077  {
5078  case GENDER_FEMALE:
5079  caster->CastSpell(target, 46356, true, nullptr, this);
5080  break;
5081  case GENDER_MALE:
5082  caster->CastSpell(target, 46355, true, nullptr, this);
5083  break;
5084  }
5085  }
5086  break;
5087  case 46361: // Reinforced Net
5088  if (caster)
5089  target->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall();
5090  break;
5091  case 46699: // Requires No Ammo
5092  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5093  target->ToPlayer()->RemoveAmmo(); // not use ammo and not allow use
5094  break;
5095  case 71563:
5096  {
5097  if (Aura* newAura = target->AddAura(71564, target))
5098  newAura->SetStackAmount(newAura->GetSpellInfo()->StackAmount);
5099  return;
5100  }
5101  }
5102  }
5103  // AT REMOVE
5104  else
5105  {
5106  if ((GetSpellInfo()->IsQuestTame()) && caster && caster->IsAlive() && target->IsAlive() && aurApp->GetRemoveMode() != AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL)
5107  {
5108  uint32 finalSpelId = 0;
5109  switch (GetId())
5110  {
5111  case 19548:
5112  finalSpelId = 19597;
5113  break;
5114  case 19674:
5115  finalSpelId = 19677;
5116  break;
5117  case 19687:
5118  finalSpelId = 19676;
5119  break;
5120  case 19688:
5121  finalSpelId = 19678;
5122  break;
5123  case 19689:
5124  finalSpelId = 19679;
5125  break;
5126  case 19692:
5127  finalSpelId = 19680;
5128  break;
5129  case 19693:
5130  finalSpelId = 19684;
5131  break;
5132  case 19694:
5133  finalSpelId = 19681;
5134  break;
5135  case 19696:
5136  finalSpelId = 19682;
5137  break;
5138  case 19697:
5139  finalSpelId = 19683;
5140  break;
5141  case 19699:
5142  finalSpelId = 19685;
5143  break;
5144  case 19700:
5145  finalSpelId = 19686;
5146  break;
5147  case 30646:
5148  finalSpelId = 30647;
5149  break;
5150  case 30653:
5151  finalSpelId = 30648;
5152  break;
5153  case 30654:
5154  finalSpelId = 30652;
5155  break;
5156  case 30099:
5157  finalSpelId = 30100;
5158  break;
5159  case 30102:
5160  finalSpelId = 30103;
5161  break;
5162  case 30105:
5163  finalSpelId = 30104;
5164  break;
5165  }
5166 
5167  if (finalSpelId)
5168  caster->CastSpell(target, finalSpelId, true, nullptr, this);
5169  }
5170 
5171  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
5172  {
5173  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
5174  switch (GetId())
5175  {
5176  case 2584: // Waiting to Resurrect
5177  // Waiting to resurrect spell cancel, we must remove player from resurrect queue
5178  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5179  {
5180  if (Battleground* bg = target->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
5181  bg->RemovePlayerFromResurrectQueue(target->ToPlayer());
5182  if(Battlefield* bf = sBattlefieldMgr->GetBattlefieldToZoneId(target->GetZoneId()))
5183  bf->RemovePlayerFromResurrectQueue(target->GetGUID());
5184  }
5185  break;
5186  case 43681: // Inactive
5187  {
5188  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || aurApp->GetRemoveMode() != AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
5189  return;
5190 
5191  if (target->GetMap()->IsBattleground())
5192  target->ToPlayer()->LeaveBattleground();
5193  break;
5194  }
5195  case 52172: // Coyote Spirit Despawn Aura
5196  case 60244: // Blood Parrot Despawn Aura
5197  target->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, GetAmount(), true, nullptr, this);
5198  break;
5199  // Halls of Lightning, Arc Lightning
5200  case 52921:
5201  {
5202  if( aurApp->GetRemoveMode() != AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE )
5203  return;
5204 
5205  Player* player = nullptr;
5206  Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck checker(target, 10.0f);
5207  Acore::PlayerSearcher<Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(target, player, checker);
5208  Cell::VisitWorldObjects(target, searcher, 10.0f);
5209 
5210  if( player && player->GetGUID() != target->GetGUID() )
5211  target->CastSpell(player, 52921, true);
5212 
5213  return;
5214  }
5215  case 58600: // Restricted Flight Area
5216  case 58730: // Restricted Flight Area
5217  if (aurApp->GetRemoveMode() == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
5218  target->CastSpell(target, 58601, true);
5219  break;
5220  case 46374: // quest The Power of the Elements (11893)
5221  {
5222  if (target->isDead() && GetBase() && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->GetEntry() == 24601)
5223  {
5224  auto caster2 = GetBase()->GetCaster();
5225  if (caster2 && caster2->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5226  {
5227  caster2->ToPlayer()->KilledMonsterCredit(25987);
5228  }
5229  }
5230  return;
5231  }
5232  }
5233  break;
5234  default:
5235  break;
5236  }
5237  }
5238  }
5239 
5240  // AT APPLY & REMOVE
5241 
5242  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
5243  {
5244  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
5245  {
5246  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5247  break;
5248  switch (GetId())
5249  {
5250  // Recently Bandaged
5251  case 11196:
5252  target->ApplySpellImmune(GetId(), IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, GetMiscValue(), apply);
5253  break;
5254  // Unstable Power
5255  case 24658:
5256  {
5257  uint32 spellId = 24659;
5258  if (apply && caster)
5259  {
5260  SpellInfo const* spell = sSpellMgr->AssertSpellInfo(spellId);
5261 
5262  for (uint32 i = 0; i < spell->StackAmount; ++i)
5263  caster->CastSpell(target, spell->Id, true, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGUID());
5264  break;
5265  }
5266  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
5267  break;
5268  }
5269  // Restless Strength
5270  case 24661:
5271  {
5272  uint32 spellId = 24662;
5273  if (apply && caster)
5274  {
5275  SpellInfo const* spell = sSpellMgr->AssertSpellInfo(spellId);
5276  for (uint32 i = 0; i < spell->StackAmount; ++i)
5277  caster->CastSpell(target, spell->Id, true, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGUID());
5278  break;
5279  }
5280  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
5281  break;
5282  }
5283  // Tag Murloc
5284  case 30877:
5285  {
5286  // Tag/untag Blacksilt Scout
5287  target->SetEntry(apply ? 17654 : 17326);
5288  break;
5289  }
5290  case 57819: // Argent Champion
5291  case 57820: // Ebon Champion
5292  case 57821: // Champion of the Kirin Tor
5293  case 57822: // Wyrmrest Champion
5294  {
5295  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5296  break;
5297 
5298  uint32 FactionID = 0;
5299 
5300  if (apply)
5301  {
5302  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
5303  {
5304  case 57819:
5305  FactionID = 1106;
5306  break; // Argent Crusade
5307  case 57820:
5308  FactionID = 1098;
5309  break; // Knights of the Ebon Blade
5310  case 57821:
5311  FactionID = 1090;
5312  break; // Kirin Tor
5313  case 57822:
5314  FactionID = 1091;
5315  break; // The Wyrmrest Accord
5316  }
5317  }
5318  caster->ToPlayer()->SetChampioningFaction(FactionID);
5319  break;
5320  }
5321  // LK Intro VO (1)
5322  case 58204:
5323  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5324  {
5325  // Play part 1
5326  if (apply)
5327  target->PlayDirectSound(14970, target->ToPlayer());
5328  // continue in 58205
5329  else
5330  target->CastSpell(target, 58205, true);
5331  }
5332  break;
5333  // LK Intro VO (2)
5334  case 58205:
5335  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5336  {
5337  // Play part 2
5338  if (apply)
5339  target->PlayDirectSound(14971, target->ToPlayer());
5340  // Play part 3
5341  else
5342  target->PlayDirectSound(14972, target->ToPlayer());
5343  }
5344  break;
5345  case 62061: // Festive Holiday Mount
5346  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED))
5347  {
5348  uint32 creatureEntry = 0;
5349  if (apply)
5350  {
5351  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED))
5352  creatureEntry = 24906;
5353  else
5354  creatureEntry = 15665;
5355  }
5356  else
5357  creatureEntry = target->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED).front()->GetMiscValue();
5358 
5359  if (CreatureTemplate const* creatureInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(creatureEntry))
5360  {
5361  uint32 displayID = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(creatureInfo);
5362  sObjectMgr->GetCreatureModelRandomGender(&displayID);
5363 
5364  target->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID, displayID);
5365  }
5366  }
5367  break;
5368  }
5369 
5370  break;
5371  }
5372  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
5373  {
5374  //if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5375  //break;
5376  break;
5377  }
5378  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
5379  {
5380  //if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5381  //break;
5382  break;
5383  }
5384  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
5385  {
5386  //if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5387  // break;
5388  break;
5389  }
5390  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
5391  {
5392  //if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5393  // break;
5394  break;
5395  }
5396  }
5397 }
5398 
5399 void AuraEffect::HandleChannelDeathItem(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5400 {
5401  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5402  return;
5403 
5404  if (apply || aurApp->GetRemoveMode() != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH)
5405  return;
5406 
5407  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
5408 
5409  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5410  return;
5411 
5412  Player* plCaster = caster->ToPlayer();
5413 
5414  // Item amount
5415  if (GetAmount() <= 0)
5416  return;
5417 
5418  if (GetSpellInfo()->Effects[m_effIndex].ItemType == 0)
5419  return;
5420 
5421  //Adding items
5422  uint32 noSpaceForCount = 0;
5423  uint32 count = m_amount;
5424 
5425  ItemPosCountVec dest;
5426  InventoryResult msg = plCaster->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, GetSpellInfo()->Effects[m_effIndex].ItemType, count, &noSpaceForCount);
5427  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
5428  {
5429  count -= noSpaceForCount;
5430  plCaster->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, GetSpellInfo()->Effects[m_effIndex].ItemType);
5431  if (count == 0)
5432  return;
5433  }
5434 
5435  Item* newitem = plCaster->StoreNewItem(dest, GetSpellInfo()->Effects[m_effIndex].ItemType, true);
5436  if (!newitem)
5437  {
5438  plCaster->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, nullptr, nullptr);
5439  return;
5440  }
5441  plCaster->SendNewItem(newitem, count, true, true);
5442 }
5443 
5444 void AuraEffect::HandleBindSight(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5445 {
5446  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5447  return;
5448 
5449  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5450 
5451  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
5452 
5453  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5454  return;
5455 
5456  caster->ToPlayer()->SetViewpoint(target, apply);
5457 }
5458 
5459 void AuraEffect::HandleFarSight(AuraApplication const* /*aurApp*/, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5460 {
5461  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5462  {
5463  return;
5464  }
5465 
5466  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
5467  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5468  {
5469  return;
5470  }
5471 
5472  Player* player = caster->ToPlayer();
5473  if (apply)
5474  {
5475  player->SetFarSightDistance(m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange());
5476  }
5477  else
5478  {
5479  player->ResetFarSightDistance();
5480  }
5481 
5482  caster->UpdateObjectVisibility(!apply);
5483 }
5484 
5485 void AuraEffect::HandleForceReaction(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5486 {
5487  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
5488  return;
5489 
5490  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5491 
5492  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5493  return;
5494 
5495  Player* player = target->ToPlayer();
5496 
5497  uint32 faction_id = GetMiscValue();
5498  ReputationRank faction_rank = ReputationRank(m_amount);
5499 
5500  player->GetReputationMgr().ApplyForceReaction(faction_id, faction_rank, apply);
5501  player->GetReputationMgr().SendForceReactions();
5502 
5503  // stop fighting if at apply forced rank friendly or at remove real rank friendly
5504  if ((apply && faction_rank >= REP_FRIENDLY) || (!apply && player->GetReputationRank(faction_id) >= REP_FRIENDLY))
5505  player->StopAttackFaction(faction_id);
5506 }
5507 
5508 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraEmpathy(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5509 {
5510  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5511  return;
5512 
5513  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5514 
5515  if (!apply)
5516  {
5517  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
5518  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
5519  return;
5520  }
5521 
5522  if (target->GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_BEAST)
5523  target->ApplyModUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_SPECIALINFO, apply);
5524 }
5525 
5526 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModFaction(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5527 {
5528  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5529  return;
5530 
5531  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5532 
5533  if (apply)
5534  {
5535  target->SetFaction(GetMiscValue());
5536  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5537  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
5538  }
5539  else
5540  {
5541  target->RestoreFaction();
5542  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5543  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED);
5544  }
5545 }
5546 
5547 void AuraEffect::HandleComprehendLanguage(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5548 {
5549  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_SEND_FOR_CLIENT_MASK))
5550  return;
5551 
5552  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5553 
5554  if (apply)
5555  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG);
5556  else
5557  {
5558  if (target->HasAuraType(GetAuraType()))
5559  return;
5560 
5561  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG);
5562  }
5563 }
5564 
5565 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraConvertRune(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5566 {
5567  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5568  return;
5569 
5570  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5571 
5572  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5573  return;
5574 
5575  Player* player = target->ToPlayer();
5576 
5577  if (player->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5578  return;
5579 
5580  uint32 runes = m_amount;
5581  // convert number of runes specified in aura amount of rune type in miscvalue to runetype in miscvalueb
5582  if (apply)
5583  {
5584  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES && runes; ++i)
5585  {
5586  if (GetMiscValue() != player->GetCurrentRune(i))
5587  continue;
5588  if (!player->GetRuneCooldown(i))
5589  {
5590  player->AddRuneByAuraEffect(i, RuneType(GetMiscValueB()), this);
5591  --runes;
5592  }
5593  }
5594  }
5595  else
5596  player->RemoveRunesByAuraEffect(this);
5597 }
5598 
5599 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraLinked(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5600 {
5601  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5602 
5603  uint32 triggeredSpellId = sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].TriggerSpell, target);
5604  SpellInfo const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggeredSpellId);
5605  if (!triggeredSpellInfo)
5606  return;
5607 
5608  if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL)
5609  {
5610  if (apply)
5611  {
5612  Unit* caster = triggeredSpellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, GetEffIndex()) ? GetCaster() : target;
5613 
5614  if (!caster)
5615  return;
5616  // If amount avalible cast with basepoints (Crypt Fever for example)
5617  if (GetAmount())
5618  caster->CastCustomSpell(target, triggeredSpellId, &m_amount, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
5619  else
5620  caster->CastSpell(target, triggeredSpellId, true, nullptr, this);
5621  }
5622  else
5623  {
5624  ObjectGuid casterGUID = triggeredSpellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, GetEffIndex()) ? GetCasterGUID() : target->GetGUID();
5625  target->RemoveAura(triggeredSpellId, casterGUID, 0, aurApp->GetRemoveMode());
5626  }
5627  }
5628  else if (mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAPPLY && apply)
5629  {
5630  ObjectGuid casterGUID = triggeredSpellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, GetEffIndex()) ? GetCasterGUID() : target->GetGUID();
5631  // change the stack amount to be equal to stack amount of our aura
5632  if (Aura* triggeredAura = target->GetAura(triggeredSpellId, casterGUID))
5633  triggeredAura->ModStackAmount(GetBase()->GetStackAmount() - triggeredAura->GetStackAmount());
5634  }
5635 }
5636 
5637 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraOpenStable(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5638 {
5639  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5640  return;
5641 
5642  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5643 
5644  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !target->IsInWorld())
5645  return;
5646 
5647  if (apply)
5648  target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->SendStablePet(target->GetGUID());
5649 
5650  // client auto close stable dialog at !apply aura
5651 }
5652 
5653 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraModFakeInebriation(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5654 {
5655  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_CHANGE_AMOUNT_MASK))
5656  return;
5657 
5658  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5659 
5660  if (apply)
5661  {
5662  target->m_invisibilityDetect.AddFlag(INVISIBILITY_DRUNK);
5663  target->m_invisibilityDetect.AddValue(INVISIBILITY_DRUNK, GetAmount());
5664 
5665  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5666  {
5667  int32 oldval = target->ToPlayer()->GetInt32Value(PLAYER_FAKE_INEBRIATION);
5668  target->ToPlayer()->SetInt32Value(PLAYER_FAKE_INEBRIATION, oldval + GetAmount());
5669  }
5670  }
5671  else
5672  {
5673  bool removeDetect = !target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FAKE_INEBRIATE);
5674 
5675  target->m_invisibilityDetect.AddValue(INVISIBILITY_DRUNK, -GetAmount());
5676 
5677  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5678  {
5679  int32 oldval = target->ToPlayer()->GetInt32Value(PLAYER_FAKE_INEBRIATION);
5680  target->ToPlayer()->SetInt32Value(PLAYER_FAKE_INEBRIATION, oldval - GetAmount());
5681 
5682  if (removeDetect)
5683  removeDetect = !target->ToPlayer()->GetDrunkValue();
5684  }
5685 
5686  if (removeDetect)
5687  target->m_invisibilityDetect.DelFlag(INVISIBILITY_DRUNK);
5688  }
5689 
5690  // call functions which may have additional effects after chainging state of unit
5691  target->UpdateObjectVisibility(false);
5692 }
5693 
5694 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraOverrideSpells(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5695 {
5696  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5697  return;
5698 
5699  Player* target = aurApp->GetTarget()->ToPlayer();
5700 
5701  if (!target || !target->IsInWorld())
5702  return;
5703 
5704  uint32 overrideId = uint32(GetMiscValue());
5705 
5706  if (apply)
5707  {
5708  target->SetUInt16Value(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, PLAYER_BYTES_2_OVERRIDE_SPELLS_UINT16_OFFSET, overrideId);
5709  if (OverrideSpellDataEntry const* overrideSpells = sOverrideSpellDataStore.LookupEntry(overrideId))
5710  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_OVERRIDE_SPELL; ++i)
5711  if (uint32 spellId = overrideSpells->spellId[i])
5712  target->_addSpell(spellId, SPEC_MASK_ALL, true);
5713  }
5714  else
5715  {
5716  target->SetUInt16Value(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, PLAYER_BYTES_2_OVERRIDE_SPELLS_UINT16_OFFSET, 0);
5717  if (OverrideSpellDataEntry const* overrideSpells = sOverrideSpellDataStore.LookupEntry(overrideId))
5718  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_OVERRIDE_SPELL; ++i)
5719  if (uint32 spellId = overrideSpells->spellId[i])
5720  target->removeSpell(spellId, SPEC_MASK_ALL, true);
5721  }
5722 }
5723 
5724 void AuraEffect::HandleAuraSetVehicle(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5725 {
5726  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5727  return;
5728 
5729  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
5730 
5731  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !target->IsInWorld())
5732  return;
5733 
5734  uint32 vehicleId = GetMiscValue();
5735 
5736  if (apply)
5737  {
5738  if (!target->CreateVehicleKit(vehicleId, 0))
5739  return;
5740  }
5741  else if (target->GetVehicleKit())
5742  target->RemoveVehicleKit();
5743 
5744  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PLAYER_VEHICLE_DATA, target->GetPackGUID().size() + 4);
5745  data << target->GetPackGUID();
5746  data << uint32(apply ? vehicleId : 0);
5747  target->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
5748 
5749  if (apply)
5750  {
5751  data.Initialize(SMSG_ON_CANCEL_EXPECTED_RIDE_VEHICLE_AURA, 0);
5752  target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
5753  }
5754 }
5755 
5756 void AuraEffect::HandlePreventResurrection(AuraApplication const* aurApp, uint8 mode, bool apply) const
5757 {
5758  if (!(mode & AURA_EFFECT_HANDLE_REAL))
5759  return;
5760 
5761  if (aurApp->GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5762  return;
5763 
5764  if (apply)
5765  aurApp->GetTarget()->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, 0, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE_RELEASE_TIMER);
5766  else if (!aurApp->GetTarget()->GetMap()->Instanceable())
5767  aurApp->GetTarget()->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, 0, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE_RELEASE_TIMER);
5768 }
5769 
5770 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicDummyAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
5771 {
5772  switch (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName)
5773  {
5774  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
5775  {
5776  switch (GetSpellInfo()->Id)
5777  {
5778  // Frenzied Regeneration
5779  case 22842:
5780  {
5781  // Converts up to 10 rage per second into health for $d. Each point of rage is converted into ${$m2/10}.1% of max health.
5782  // Should be manauser
5783  if (target->getPowerType() != POWER_RAGE)
5784  break;
5785  uint32 rage = target->GetPower(POWER_RAGE);
5786  // Nothing todo
5787  if (rage == 0)
5788  break;
5789  int32 mod = (rage < 100) ? rage : 100;
5790  int32 points = target->CalculateSpellDamage(target, GetSpellInfo(), 1);
5791  int32 regen = target->GetMaxHealth() * (mod * points / 10) / 1000;
5792  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 22845, &regen, 0, 0, true, 0, this);
5793  target->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, rage - mod);
5794  break;
5795  }
5796  }
5797  break;
5798  }
5799  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
5800  {
5801  // Explosive Shot
5802  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x80000000)
5803  {
5804  if (caster)
5805  caster->CastCustomSpell(53352, SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, m_amount, target, true, nullptr, this);
5806  break;
5807  }
5808  switch (GetSpellInfo()->Id)
5809  {
5810  // Feeding Frenzy Rank 1
5811  case 53511:
5812  if (target->GetVictim() && target->GetVictim()->HealthBelowPct(35))
5813  target->CastSpell(target, 60096, true, 0, this);
5814  return;
5815  // Feeding Frenzy Rank 2
5816  case 53512:
5817  if (target->GetVictim() && target->GetVictim()->HealthBelowPct(35))
5818  target->CastSpell(target, 60097, true, 0, this);
5819  return;
5820  default:
5821  break;
5822  }
5823  break;
5824  }
5825  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
5826  if (GetId() == 52179) // Astral Shift
5827  {
5828  // Periodic need for remove visual on stun/fear/silence lost
5829  if (!(target->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS) & (UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED | UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED)))
5830  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(52179);
5831  break;
5832  }
5833  break;
5834  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
5835  switch (GetId())
5836  {
5837  case 49016: // Hysteria
5838  uint32 damage = uint32(target->CountPctFromMaxHealth(1));
5839  Unit::DealDamage(target, target, damage, nullptr, NODAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
5840  break;
5841  }
5842  // Blood of the North
5843  // Reaping
5844  // Death Rune Mastery
5845  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 3041 || GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 22 || GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 2622)
5846  {
5847  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5848  return;
5849  if (target->ToPlayer()->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5850  return;
5851 
5852  // timer expired - remove death runes
5853  target->ToPlayer()->RemoveRunesByAuraEffect(this);
5854  }
5855  break;
5856  default:
5857  break;
5858  }
5859 }
5860 
5861 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
5862 {
5863  // generic casting code with custom spells and target/caster customs
5864  uint32 triggerSpellId = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].TriggerSpell;
5865 
5866  SpellInfo const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggerSpellId);
5867  SpellInfo const* auraSpellInfo = GetSpellInfo();
5868  uint32 auraId = auraSpellInfo->Id;
5869 
5870  // specific code for cases with no trigger spell provided in field
5871  if (triggeredSpellInfo == nullptr)
5872  {
5873  switch (auraSpellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
5874  {
5875  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
5876  {
5877  switch (auraId)
5878  {
5879  // Thaumaturgy Channel
5880  case 9712:
5881  triggerSpellId = 21029;
5882  if (caster)
5883  caster->CastSpell(caster, triggerSpellId, true);
5884  return;
5885  // Brood Affliction: Bronze
5886  case 23170:
5887  triggerSpellId = 23171;
5888  break;
5889  // Restoration
5890  case 24379:
5891  case 23493:
5892  {
5893  if (caster)
5894  {
5895  int32 heal = caster->CountPctFromMaxHealth(10);
5896  HealInfo healInfo(caster, target, heal, auraSpellInfo, auraSpellInfo->GetSchoolMask());
5897  caster->HealBySpell(healInfo);
5898 
5899  if (int32 mana = caster->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
5900  {
5901  mana /= 10;
5902  caster->EnergizeBySpell(caster, 23493, mana, POWER_MANA);
5903  }
5904  }
5905  return;
5906  }
5907  // Nitrous Boost
5908  case 27746:
5909  if (caster && target->GetPower(POWER_MANA) >= 10)
5910  {
5911  target->ModifyPower(POWER_MANA, -10);
5912  target->SendEnergizeSpellLog(caster, 27746, 10, POWER_MANA);
5913  }
5914  else
5915  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(27746);
5916  return;
5917  // Frost Blast
5918  case 27808:
5919  if (caster)
5920  {
5921  caster->CastCustomSpell(29879, SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, int32(target->CountPctFromMaxHealth(21)), target, true, nullptr, this);
5922  if (GetTickNumber() == 1)
5923  caster->CastSpell(target, 27808, true);
5924  }
5925  return;
5926  // Inoculate Nestlewood Owlkin
5927  case 29528:
5928  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT) // prevent error reports in case ignored player target
5929  return;
5930  break;
5931  // Feed Captured Animal
5932  case 29917:
5933  triggerSpellId = 29916;
5934  break;
5935  // Extract Gas
5936  case 30427:
5937  {
5938  // move loot to player inventory and despawn target
5939  if (caster && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER &&
5940  target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT &&
5941  target->ToCreature()->GetCreatureTemplate()->type == CREATURE_TYPE_GAS_CLOUD)
5942  {
5943  Player* player = caster->ToPlayer();
5944  Creature* creature = target->ToCreature();
5945  // missing lootid has been reported on startup - just return
5946  if (!creature->GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId)
5947  return;
5948 
5949  player->AutoStoreLoot(creature->GetCreatureTemplate()->SkinLootId, LootTemplates_Skinning, true);
5950 
5951  creature->DespawnOrUnsummon();
5952  }
5953  return;
5954  }
5955  // Quake
5956  case 30576:
5957  triggerSpellId = 30571;
5958  break;
5959  // Doom
5960  // TODO: effect trigger spell may be independant on spell targets, and executed in spell finish phase
5961  // so instakill will be naturally done before trigger spell
5962  case 31347:
5963  {
5964  target->CastSpell(target, 31350, true, nullptr, this);
5965  Unit::Kill(target, target);
5966  return;
5967  }
5968  // Spellcloth
5969  case 31373:
5970  {
5971  // Summon Elemental after create item
5972  target->SummonCreature(17870, 0, 0, 0, target->GetOrientation(), TEMPSUMMON_DEAD_DESPAWN, 0);
5973  return;
5974  }
5975  // Eye of Grillok
5976  case 38495:
5977  triggerSpellId = 38530;
5978  break;
5979  // Absorb Eye of Grillok (Zezzak's Shard)
5980  case 38554:
5981  {
5982  if (!caster || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
5983  return;
5984 
5985  caster->CastSpell(caster, 38495, true, nullptr, this);
5986 
5987  Creature* creatureTarget = target->ToCreature();
5988 
5989  creatureTarget->DespawnOrUnsummon();
5990  return;
5991  }
5992  // Tear of Azzinoth Summon Channel - it's not really supposed to do anything, and this only prevents the console spam
5993  case 39857:
5994  triggerSpellId = 39856;
5995  break;
5996  // Personalized Weather
5997  case 46736:
5998  triggerSpellId = 46737;
5999  break;
6000  // Shield Level 1
6001  case 63130:
6002  // Shield Level 2
6003  case 63131:
6004  // Shield Level 3
6005  case 63132:
6006  // Ball of Flames Visual
6007  case 71706:
6008  return;
6009  // Oculus, Mage-Lord Urom, Time Bomb
6010  case 51121:
6011  case 59376:
6012  {
6013  const int32 dmg = target->GetMaxHealth() - target->GetHealth();
6014  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 51132, &dmg, 0, 0, true);
6015  return;
6016  }
6017  }
6018  break;
6019  }
6020  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
6021  {
6022  switch (auraId)
6023  {
6024  // Lightning Shield (The Earthshatterer set trigger after cast Lighting Shield)
6025  case 28820:
6026  {
6027  // Need remove self if Lightning Shield not active
6028  if (!target->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL, SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN, 0x400, 0, 0))
6029  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(28820);
6030  return;
6031  }
6032  }
6033  break;
6034  }
6035  default:
6036  break;
6037  }
6038  }
6039  else
6040  {
6041  // Spell exist but require custom code
6042  switch (auraId)
6043  {
6044  // Mana Tide
6045  case 16191:
6046  target->CastCustomSpell(target, triggerSpellId, &m_amount, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
6047  return;
6048  // Poison (Grobbulus)
6049  case 28158:
6050  case 54362:
6051  // Slime Pool (Dreadscale & Acidmaw)
6052  case 66882:
6053  target->CastCustomSpell(triggerSpellId, SPELLVALUE_RADIUS_MOD, (int32)((((float)m_tickNumber / 60) * 0.9f + 0.1f) * 10000 * 2 / 3), nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
6054  return;
6055  // Eye of Eternity, Malygos, Arcane Overload
6056  case 56432:
6057  if (triggerSpellId == 56438)
6058  {
6059  target->CastCustomSpell(triggerSpellId, SPELLVALUE_RADIUS_MOD, (int32)(10000 * (1.0f - 0.02f * (m_tickNumber + 1))), nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
6060  return;
6061  }
6062  break;
6063  // Beacon of Light
6064  case 53563:
6065  {
6066  // area aura owner casts the spell
6067  GetBase()->GetUnitOwner()->CastSpell(target, triggeredSpellInfo, true, 0, this, GetBase()->GetUnitOwner()->GetGUID());
6068  return;
6069  }
6070  // Slime Spray - temporary here until preventing default effect works again
6071  // added on 9.10.2010
6072  case 69508:
6073  {
6074  if (caster)
6075  caster->CastSpell(target, triggerSpellId, true, nullptr, nullptr, caster->GetGUID());
6076  return;
6077  }
6078  // Trial of the Crusader, Jaraxxus, Spinning Pain Spike
6079  case 66283:
6080  {
6081  const int32 dmg = target->GetMaxHealth() / 2;
6082  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 66316, &dmg, nullptr, nullptr, true);
6083  return;
6084  }
6085  // Violet Hold, Moragg, Ray of Suffering, Ray of Pain
6086  case 54442:
6087  case 59524:
6088  case 54438:
6089  case 59523:
6090  {
6091  if (caster)
6092  if (Unit* victim = caster->GetVictim())
6093  if(victim->GetDistance(caster) < 45.0f)
6094  {
6095  target = victim;
6096  break;
6097  }
6098  return;
6099  }
6100  case 24745: // Summon Templar, Trigger
6101  case 24747: // Summon Templar Fire, Trigger
6102  case 24757: // Summon Templar Air, Trigger
6103  case 24759: // Summon Templar Earth, Trigger
6104  case 24761: // Summon Templar Water, Trigger
6105  case 24762: // Summon Duke, Trigger
6106  case 24766: // Summon Duke Fire, Trigger
6107  case 24769: // Summon Duke Air, Trigger
6108  case 24771: // Summon Duke Earth, Trigger
6109  case 24773: // Summon Duke Water, Trigger
6110  case 24785: // Summon Royal, Trigger
6111  case 24787: // Summon Royal Fire, Trigger
6112  case 24791: // Summon Royal Air, Trigger
6113  case 24792: // Summon Royal Earth, Trigger
6114  case 24793: // Summon Royal Water, Trigger
6115  {
6116  // All this spells trigger a spell that requires reagents; if the
6117  // triggered spell is cast as "triggered", reagents are not consumed
6118  if (caster)
6119  caster->CastSpell(target, triggerSpellId, false);
6120  return;
6121  }
6122  // Hunter - Rapid Recuperation
6123  case 56654:
6124  case 58882:
6125  int32 amount = int32(target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * GetAmount() / 100.0f);
6126  target->CastCustomSpell(target, triggerSpellId, &amount, nullptr, nullptr, true);
6127  return;
6128  }
6129  }
6130 
6131  // Reget trigger spell proto
6132  triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggerSpellId);
6133 
6134  if (triggeredSpellInfo)
6135  {
6136  if (Unit* triggerCaster = triggeredSpellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, GetEffIndex()) ? caster : target)
6137  {
6138  SpellCastTargets targets;
6139  targets.SetUnitTarget(target);
6140  if (triggeredSpellInfo->IsChannelCategorySpell() && m_channelData)
6141  {
6142  targets.SetDstChannel(m_channelData->spellDst);
6143  targets.SetObjectTargetChannel(m_channelData->channelGUID);
6144  }
6145 
6146  // Xinef: do not skip reagent cost for entry casts
6147  TriggerCastFlags triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK;
6148  if (GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].TargetA.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY || GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].TargetB.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY)
6149  triggerFlags = TriggerCastFlags(TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK & ~TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST);
6150 
6151  triggerCaster->CastSpell(targets, triggeredSpellInfo, nullptr, triggerFlags, nullptr, this);
6152  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellAuraTick: Spell %u Trigger %u", GetId(), triggeredSpellInfo->Id);
6153  }
6154  }
6155 }
6156 
6157 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellWithValueAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6158 {
6159  uint32 triggerSpellId = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[m_effIndex].TriggerSpell;
6160  if (SpellInfo const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggerSpellId))
6161  {
6162  if (Unit* triggerCaster = triggeredSpellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, GetEffIndex()) ? caster : target)
6163  {
6164  SpellCastTargets targets;
6165  targets.SetUnitTarget(target);
6166  if (triggeredSpellInfo->IsChannelCategorySpell() && m_channelData)
6167  {
6168  targets.SetDstChannel(m_channelData->spellDst);
6169  targets.SetObjectTargetChannel(m_channelData->channelGUID);
6170  }
6171 
6172  CustomSpellValues values;
6173  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, GetAmount());
6174 
6175  triggerCaster->CastSpell(targets, triggeredSpellInfo, &values, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK, nullptr, this);
6176  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellWithValueAuraTick: Spell %u Trigger %u", GetId(), triggeredSpellInfo->Id);
6177  }
6178  }
6179  else
6180  {
6181 #ifdef ELUNA
6182  Creature* c = target->ToCreature();
6183  if (c && caster)
6184  sEluna->OnDummyEffect(caster, GetId(), SpellEffIndex(GetEffIndex()), target->ToCreature());
6185 #endif
6186  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellWithValueAuraTick: Spell %u has non-existent spell %u in EffectTriggered[%d] and is therefor not triggered.", GetId(), triggerSpellId, GetEffIndex());
6187  }
6188 }
6189 
6190 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicDamageAurasTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6191 {
6192  if (!target->IsAlive())
6193  return;
6194 
6195  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED) || target->IsImmunedToDamageOrSchool(GetSpellInfo()) || target->IsTotem())
6196  {
6197  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6198  return;
6199  }
6200 
6201  // Consecrate ticks can miss and will not show up in the combat log
6202  if (caster && GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA &&
6203  caster->SpellHitResult(target, GetSpellInfo(), false) != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
6204  return;
6205 
6206  // some auras remove at specific health level or more
6207  if (GetAuraType() == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE)
6208  {
6209  switch (GetSpellInfo()->Id)
6210  {
6211  case 43093:
6212  case 31956:
6213  case 38801: // Grievous Wound
6214  case 35321:
6215  case 38363:
6216  case 39215: // Gushing Wound
6217  if (target->IsFullHealth())
6218  {
6219  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetSpellInfo()->Id);
6220  return;
6221  }
6222  break;
6223  case 38772: // Grievous Wound
6224  {
6225  uint32 percent = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue(caster);
6226  if (!target->HealthBelowPct(percent))
6227  {
6228  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetSpellInfo()->Id);
6229  return;
6230  }
6231  break;
6232  }
6233  }
6234  }
6235 
6236  CleanDamage cleanDamage = CleanDamage(0, 0, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL);
6237 
6238  // ignore non positive values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
6239  uint32 damage = std::max(GetAmount(), 0);
6240 
6241  // Script Hook For HandlePeriodicDamageAurasTick -- Allow scripts to change the Damage pre class mitigation calculations
6242  sScriptMgr->ModifyPeriodicDamageAurasTick(target, caster, damage);
6243 
6244  if (GetAuraType() == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE)
6245  {
6246  // xinef: leave only target depending bonuses, rest is handled in calculate amount
6247  if (GetBase()->GetType() == DYNOBJ_AURA_TYPE && caster)
6248  damage = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(target, GetSpellInfo(), damage, DOT, 0.0f, GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
6249  damage = target->SpellDamageBonusTaken(caster, GetSpellInfo(), damage, DOT, GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
6250 
6251  // Calculate armor mitigation
6252  if (Unit::IsDamageReducedByArmor(GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo(), GetEffIndex()))
6253  {
6254  uint32 damageReductedArmor = Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage(caster, target, damage, GetSpellInfo(), GetCasterLevel());
6255  cleanDamage.mitigated_damage += damage - damageReductedArmor;
6256  damage = damageReductedArmor;
6257  }
6258 
6259  // Curse of Agony damage-per-tick calculation
6260  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x400) && GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 544)
6261  {
6262  uint32 totalTick = GetTotalTicks();
6263  // 1..4 ticks, 1/2 from normal tick damage
6264  if (m_tickNumber <= totalTick / 3)
6265  damage = damage / 2;
6266  // 9..12 ticks, 3/2 from normal tick damage
6267  else if (m_tickNumber > totalTick * 2 / 3)
6268  damage += (damage + 1) / 2; // +1 prevent 0.5 damage possible lost at 1..4 ticks
6269  // 5..8 ticks have normal tick damage
6270  }
6271  }
6272  else // xinef: ceil obtained value, it may happen that 10 ticks for 10% damage may not kill owner
6273  damage = uint32(ceil(CalculatePct<float, float>(target->GetMaxHealth(), damage)));
6274 
6275  // calculate crit chance
6276  bool crit = false;
6277  if ((crit = roll_chance_f(GetCritChance())))
6278  damage = Unit::SpellCriticalDamageBonus(caster, m_spellInfo, damage, target);
6279 
6280  // Auras reducing damage from AOE spells
6281  if (GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].IsAreaAuraEffect() || GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].IsTargetingArea() || GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA) // some persistent area auras have targets like A=53 B=28
6282  {
6283  damage = target->CalculateAOEDamageReduction(damage, GetSpellInfo()->SchoolMask, caster);
6284  }
6285 
6286  if (CanApplyResilience())
6287  {
6288  int32 resilienceReduction = damage;
6289  Unit::ApplyResilience(target, nullptr, &resilienceReduction, crit, CR_CRIT_TAKEN_SPELL);
6290 
6291  resilienceReduction = damage - resilienceReduction;
6292  damage -= resilienceReduction;
6293  cleanDamage.mitigated_damage += resilienceReduction;
6294  }
6295 
6296  DamageInfo dmgInfo(caster, target, damage, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), DOT, cleanDamage.mitigated_damage);
6297  Unit::CalcAbsorbResist(dmgInfo);
6298 
6299  uint32 absorb = dmgInfo.GetAbsorb();
6300  uint32 resist = dmgInfo.GetResist();
6301  damage = dmgInfo.GetDamage();
6302 
6303  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura.effect", "PeriodicTick: %s attacked %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u abs is %u",
6304  GetCasterGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), damage, GetId(), absorb);
6305  Unit::DealDamageMods(target, damage, &absorb);
6306 
6307  // Set trigger flag
6308  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_PERIODIC;
6309  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_PERIODIC;
6310  uint32 procEx = (crit ? PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT : PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT) | PROC_EX_INTERNAL_DOT;
6311  if (absorb > 0)
6312  procEx |= PROC_EX_ABSORB;
6313 
6314  if (damage)
6315  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE;
6316 
6317  int32 overkill = damage - target->GetHealth();
6318  if (overkill < 0)
6319  overkill = 0;
6320 
6321  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, damage, overkill, absorb, resist, 0.0f, crit);
6322  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
6323 
6324  Unit::DealDamage(caster, target, damage, &cleanDamage, DOT, GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo(), true);
6325  // allow null caster to call this function
6326  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(target, caster ? procAttacker : 0, procVictim, procEx, damage, BASE_ATTACK, GetSpellInfo(), nullptr, GetEffIndex(), nullptr, &dmgInfo);
6327 }
6328 
6329 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicHealthLeechAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6330 {
6331  if (!target->IsAlive())
6332  return;
6333 
6334  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED) || target->IsImmunedToDamageOrSchool(GetSpellInfo()))
6335  {
6336  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6337  return;
6338  }
6339 
6340  if (caster && GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA &&
6341  caster->SpellHitResult(target, GetSpellInfo(), false) != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
6342  return;
6343 
6344  CleanDamage cleanDamage = CleanDamage(0, 0, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL);
6345 
6346  uint32 damage = std::max(GetAmount(), 0);
6347 
6348  // Script Hook For HandlePeriodicHealthLeechAurasTick -- Allow scripts to change the Damage pre class mitigation calculations
6349  sScriptMgr->ModifyPeriodicDamageAurasTick(target, caster, damage);
6350 
6351  if (GetBase()->GetType() == DYNOBJ_AURA_TYPE)
6352  damage = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(target, GetSpellInfo(), damage, DOT, 0.0f, GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
6353  damage = target->SpellDamageBonusTaken(caster, GetSpellInfo(), damage, DOT, GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
6354 
6355  bool crit = false;
6356  if ((crit = roll_chance_f(GetCritChance())))
6357  damage = Unit::SpellCriticalDamageBonus(caster, m_spellInfo, damage, target);
6358 
6359  // Calculate armor mitigation
6360  if (Unit::IsDamageReducedByArmor(GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo(), m_effIndex))
6361  {
6362  uint32 damageReductedArmor = Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage(caster, target, damage, GetSpellInfo(), GetCasterLevel());
6363  cleanDamage.mitigated_damage += damage - damageReductedArmor;
6364  damage = damageReductedArmor;
6365  }
6366 
6367  if (CanApplyResilience())
6368  {
6369  int32 resilienceReduction = damage;
6370  Unit::ApplyResilience(target, nullptr, &resilienceReduction, crit, CR_CRIT_TAKEN_SPELL);
6371 
6372  resilienceReduction = damage - resilienceReduction;
6373  damage -= resilienceReduction;
6374  cleanDamage.mitigated_damage += resilienceReduction;
6375  }
6376 
6377  DamageInfo dmgInfo(caster, target, damage, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), DOT, cleanDamage.mitigated_damage);
6378  Unit::CalcAbsorbResist(dmgInfo);
6379 
6380  uint32 absorb = dmgInfo.GetAbsorb();
6381  uint32 resist = dmgInfo.GetResist();
6382  damage = dmgInfo.GetDamage();
6383 
6384  // Set trigger flag
6385  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_PERIODIC;
6386  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_PERIODIC;
6387  uint32 procEx = (crit ? PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT : PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT) | PROC_EX_INTERNAL_DOT;
6388  if (absorb > 0)
6389  procEx |= PROC_EX_ABSORB;
6390 
6391  if (dmgInfo.GetDamage())
6392  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE;
6393 
6394  if (target->GetHealth() < dmgInfo.GetDamage())
6395  {
6396  dmgInfo.ModifyDamage(dmgInfo.GetDamage() - target->GetHealth());
6397  }
6398 
6399  damage = dmgInfo.GetDamage();
6400 
6401  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura.effect", "PeriodicTick: %s health leech of %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u abs is %u",
6402  GetCasterGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), damage, GetId(), absorb);
6403  if (caster)
6404  caster->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(target, GetSpellInfo(), damage, GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), absorb, resist, false, 0, crit);
6405 
6406  int32 new_damage;
6407 
6408  new_damage = Unit::DealDamage(caster, target, damage, &cleanDamage, DOT, GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo(), false);
6409  // allow null caster to call this function
6410  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(target, caster ? procAttacker : 0, procVictim, procEx, damage, BASE_ATTACK, GetSpellInfo(), nullptr, GetEffIndex(), nullptr, &dmgInfo);
6411 
6412  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive())
6413  return;
6414 
6415  float gainMultiplier = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].CalcValueMultiplier(caster);
6416 
6417  uint32 heal = uint32(caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(caster, GetSpellInfo(), uint32(new_damage * gainMultiplier), DOT, 0.0f, GetBase()->GetStackAmount()));
6418  heal = uint32(caster->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, GetSpellInfo(), heal, DOT, GetBase()->GetStackAmount()));
6419 
6420  HealInfo healInfo(caster, caster, heal, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask());
6421  int32 gain = caster->HealBySpell(healInfo);
6422  caster->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(caster, gain * 0.5f, GetSpellInfo());
6423 }
6424 
6425 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicHealthFunnelAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6426 {
6427  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive() || !target->IsAlive())
6428  return;
6429 
6430  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED))
6431  {
6432  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6433  return;
6434  }
6435 
6436  uint32 damage = std::max(GetAmount(), 0);
6437  // do not kill health donator
6438  if (caster->GetHealth() < damage)
6439  damage = caster->GetHealth() - 1;
6440  if (!damage)
6441  return;
6442 
6443  caster->ModifyHealth(-(int32)damage);
6444  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "PeriodicTick: donator %u target %u damage %u.", caster->GetEntry(), target->GetEntry(), damage);
6445 
6446  float gainMultiplier = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].CalcValueMultiplier(caster);
6447 
6448  damage = int32(damage * gainMultiplier);
6449 
6450  HealInfo healInfo(caster, target, damage, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask());
6451  caster->HealBySpell(healInfo);
6452 }
6453 
6454 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicHealAurasTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6455 {
6456  if (!target->IsAlive())
6457  return;
6458 
6459  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED))
6460  {
6461  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6462  return;
6463  }
6464 
6465  // heal for caster damage (must be alive)
6466  if (target != caster && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_NO_TARGET_PER_SECOND_COST) && (!caster || !caster->IsAlive()))
6467  return;
6468 
6469  // don't regen when permanent aura target has full power
6470  if (GetBase()->IsPermanent() && target->IsFullHealth())
6471  return;
6472 
6473  // ignore negative values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
6474  int32 damage = std::max(m_amount, 0);
6475 
6476  if (GetAuraType() == SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH)
6477  {
6478  // Taken mods
6479  float TakenTotalMod = 1.0f;
6480 
6481  // Tenacity increase healing % taken
6482  if (AuraEffect const* Tenacity = target->GetAuraEffect(58549, 0))
6483  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, Tenacity->GetAmount());
6484 
6485  // Healing taken percent
6486  float minval = (float)target->GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_PCT);
6487  if (minval)
6488  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, minval);
6489 
6490  float maxval = (float)target->GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_PCT);
6491  if (maxval)
6492  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, maxval);
6493 
6494  // Healing over time taken percent
6495  float minval_hot = (float)target->GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HOT_PCT);
6496  if (minval_hot)
6497  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, minval_hot);
6498 
6499  float maxval_hot = (float)target->GetMaxPositiveAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HOT_PCT);
6500  if (maxval_hot)
6501  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, maxval_hot);
6502 
6503  // Arena / BG Dampening
6504  float minval_pct = (float)target->GetMaxNegativeAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_DONE_PERCENT);
6505  if (minval_pct)
6506  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, minval_pct);
6507 
6508  TakenTotalMod = std::max(TakenTotalMod, 0.0f);
6509 
6510  // the most ugly hack i made :P the other option is to change all spellvalues to float...
6511  // demonic aegis
6512  if (caster && GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x20000000))
6513  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = caster->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_ADD_PCT_MODIFIER, SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, 89, 0))
6514  AddPct(TakenTotalMod, aurEff->GetAmount());
6515 
6516  damage = uint32(target->CountPctFromMaxHealth(damage));
6517  damage = uint32(damage * TakenTotalMod);
6518  }
6519  else
6520  {
6521  // Wild Growth = amount + (6 - 2*doneTicks) * ticks* amount / 100
6522  if (GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID && GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 2864)
6523  {
6524  uint32 tickNumber = GetTickNumber() - 1;
6525  int32 tempAmount = m_spellInfo->Effects[m_effIndex].CalcValue(caster, &m_baseAmount, nullptr);
6526 
6527  float drop = 2.0f;
6528 
6529  // Item - Druid T10 Restoration 2P Bonus
6530  if (caster)
6531  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = caster->GetAuraEffect(70658, 0))
6532  AddPct(drop, -aurEff->GetAmount());
6533 
6534  damage += GetTotalTicks() * tempAmount * (6 - (drop * tickNumber)) * 0.01f;
6535  }
6536 
6537  if (GetBase()->GetType() == DYNOBJ_AURA_TYPE)
6538  damage = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(target, GetSpellInfo(), damage, DOT, 0.0f, GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
6539  damage = target->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, GetSpellInfo(), damage, DOT, GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
6540  }
6541 
6542  bool crit = false;
6543  if ((crit = roll_chance_f(GetCritChance())))
6544  damage = Unit::SpellCriticalHealingBonus(caster, GetSpellInfo(), damage, target);
6545 
6546  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura.effect", "PeriodicTick: %s heal of %s for %u health inflicted by %u",
6547  GetCasterGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), damage, GetId());
6548 
6549  uint32 heal = uint32(damage);
6550 
6551  // Script Hook For HandlePeriodicDamageAurasTick -- Allow scripts to change the Damage pre class mitigation calculations
6552  sScriptMgr->ModifyPeriodicDamageAurasTick(target, caster, heal);
6553 
6554  HealInfo healInfo(caster, target, heal, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask());
6555  Unit::CalcHealAbsorb(healInfo);
6556  int32 gain = Unit::DealHeal(caster, target, healInfo.GetHeal());
6557 
6558  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, healInfo.GetHeal(), healInfo.GetHeal() - gain, healInfo.GetAbsorb(), 0, 0.0f, crit);
6559  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
6560 
6561  if (caster)
6562  target->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(caster, float(gain) * 0.5f, GetSpellInfo());
6563 
6564  bool haveCastItem = GetBase()->GetCastItemGUID();
6565 
6566  // Health Funnel
6567  // damage caster for heal amount
6568  // xinef: caster is available, checked earlier
6569  if (target != caster && GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_NO_TARGET_PER_SECOND_COST))
6570  {
6571  uint32 manaPerSecond = GetSpellInfo()->ManaPerSecond;
6572  if ((int32)manaPerSecond > gain && gain > 0)
6573  {
6574  manaPerSecond = gain;
6575  }
6576 
6577  uint32 absorb2 = 0;
6578  Unit::DealDamageMods(caster, manaPerSecond, &absorb2);
6579 
6580  CleanDamage cleanDamage = CleanDamage(0, 0, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL);
6581  Unit::DealDamage(caster, caster, manaPerSecond, &cleanDamage, SELF_DAMAGE, GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo(), true);
6582  }
6583 
6584  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_PERIODIC;
6585  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_PERIODIC;
6586  uint32 procEx = (crit ? PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT : PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT) | PROC_EX_INTERNAL_HOT;
6587  if (healInfo.GetAbsorb() > 0)
6588  procEx |= PROC_EX_ABSORB;
6589 
6590  // ignore item heals
6591  if (!haveCastItem && GetAuraType() != SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH) // xinef: dont allow obs_mod_health to proc spells, this is passive regeneration and not hot
6592  // xinef: allow null caster to proc
6593  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(target, caster ? procAttacker : 0, procVictim, procEx, heal, BASE_ATTACK, GetSpellInfo(), nullptr, GetEffIndex(), nullptr, nullptr, &healInfo);
6594 }
6595 
6596 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicManaLeechAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6597 {
6598  Powers PowerType = Powers(GetMiscValue());
6599 
6600  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive() || !target->IsAlive() || target->getPowerType() != PowerType)
6601  return;
6602 
6603  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED) || target->IsImmunedToDamageOrSchool(GetSpellInfo()))
6604  {
6605  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6606  return;
6607  }
6608 
6609  if (GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA &&
6610  caster->SpellHitResult(target, GetSpellInfo(), false) != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
6611  return;
6612 
6613  // ignore negative values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
6614  int32 drainAmount = std::max(m_amount, 0);
6615 
6616  // Special case: draining x% of mana (up to a maximum of 2*x% of the caster's maximum mana)
6617  // It's mana percent cost spells, m_amount is percent drain from target
6618  if (m_spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage)
6619  {
6620  // max value
6621  int32 maxmana = CalculatePct(caster->GetMaxPower(PowerType), drainAmount * 2.0f);
6622  ApplyPct(drainAmount, target->GetMaxPower(PowerType));
6623  if (drainAmount > maxmana)
6624  drainAmount = maxmana;
6625  }
6626 
6627  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura.effect", "PeriodicTick: %s power leech of %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u",
6628  GetCasterGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), drainAmount, GetId());
6629  // resilience reduce mana draining effect at spell crit damage reduction (added in 2.4)
6630  if (PowerType == POWER_MANA)
6631  drainAmount -= target->GetSpellCritDamageReduction(drainAmount);
6632 
6633  int32 drainedAmount = -target->ModifyPower(PowerType, -drainAmount);
6634 
6635  float gainMultiplier = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].CalcValueMultiplier(caster);
6636 
6637  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, drainedAmount, 0, 0, 0, gainMultiplier, false);
6638  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
6639 
6640  int32 gainAmount = int32(drainedAmount * gainMultiplier);
6641  int32 gainedAmount = 0;
6642  if (gainAmount)
6643  {
6644  gainedAmount = caster->ModifyPower(PowerType, gainAmount);
6645  target->AddThreat(caster, float(gainedAmount) * 0.5f, GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo());
6646  }
6647 
6648  target->AddThreat(caster, float(gainedAmount) * 0.5f, GetSpellInfo()->GetSchoolMask(), GetSpellInfo());
6649 
6650  // remove CC auras
6651  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_TAKE_DAMAGE);
6652 
6653  // Drain Mana
6654  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK
6655  && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00000010)
6656  {
6657  int32 manaFeedVal = 0;
6658  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = GetBase()->GetEffect(1))
6659  manaFeedVal = aurEff->GetAmount();
6660  // Mana Feed - Drain Mana
6661  if (manaFeedVal > 0)
6662  {
6663  int32 feedAmount = CalculatePct(gainedAmount, manaFeedVal);
6664  caster->CastCustomSpell(caster, 32554, &feedAmount, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
6665  }
6666  }
6667 }
6668 
6669 void AuraEffect::HandleObsModPowerAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6670 {
6671  Powers PowerType;
6672  if (GetMiscValue() == POWER_ALL)
6673  PowerType = target->getPowerType();
6674  else
6675  PowerType = Powers(GetMiscValue());
6676 
6677  if (!target->IsAlive() || !target->GetMaxPower(PowerType))
6678  return;
6679 
6680  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED))
6681  {
6682  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6683  return;
6684  }
6685 
6686  // don't regen when permanent aura target has full power
6687  if (GetBase()->IsPermanent() && target->GetPower(PowerType) == target->GetMaxPower(PowerType))
6688  return;
6689 
6690  // ignore negative values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
6691  uint32 amount = std::max(m_amount, 0) * target->GetMaxPower(PowerType) / 100;
6692  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura.effect", "PeriodicTick: %s energize %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u",
6693  GetCasterGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), amount, GetId());
6694  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, amount, 0, 0, 0, 0.0f, false);
6695  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
6696 
6697  int32 gain = target->ModifyPower(PowerType, amount);
6698 
6699  if (caster)
6700  target->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(caster, float(gain) * 0.5f, GetSpellInfo());
6701 }
6702 
6703 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicEnergizeAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6704 {
6705  Powers PowerType = Powers(GetMiscValue());
6706 
6707  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && target->getPowerType() != PowerType && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_ONLY_IN_SPELLBOOK_UNTIL_LEARNED))
6708  return;
6709 
6710  if (!target->IsAlive() || !target->GetMaxPower(PowerType))
6711  return;
6712 
6713  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED))
6714  {
6715  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6716  return;
6717  }
6718 
6719  // don't regen when permanent aura target has full power
6720  if (GetBase()->IsPermanent() && target->GetPower(PowerType) == target->GetMaxPower(PowerType))
6721  return;
6722 
6723  // ignore negative values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
6724  int32 amount = std::max(m_amount, 0);
6725 
6726  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, amount, 0, 0, 0, 0.0f, false);
6727  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
6728 
6729  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura.effect", "PeriodicTick: %s energize %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u",
6730  GetCasterGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), amount, GetId());
6731  int32 gain = target->ModifyPower(PowerType, amount);
6732 
6733  if (caster)
6734  target->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(caster, float(gain) * 0.5f, GetSpellInfo());
6735 }
6736 
6737 void AuraEffect::HandlePeriodicPowerBurnAuraTick(Unit* target, Unit* caster) const
6738 {
6739  Powers PowerType = Powers(GetMiscValue());
6740 
6741  if (!caster || !target->IsAlive() || target->getPowerType() != PowerType)
6742  return;
6743 
6744  if (target->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED) || target->IsImmunedToDamageOrSchool(GetSpellInfo()))
6745  {
6746  SendTickImmune(target, caster);
6747  return;
6748  }
6749 
6750  // ignore negative values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
6751  int32 damage = std::max(m_amount, 0);
6752 
6753  // resilience reduce mana draining effect at spell crit damage reduction (added in 2.4)
6754  if (PowerType == POWER_MANA)
6755  damage -= target->GetSpellCritDamageReduction(damage);
6756 
6757  uint32 gain = uint32(-target->ModifyPower(PowerType, -damage));
6758 
6759  float dmgMultiplier = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].CalcValueMultiplier(caster);
6760 
6761  SpellInfo const* spellProto = GetSpellInfo();
6762  // maybe has to be sent different to client, but not by SMSG_PERIODICAURALOG
6763  SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(caster, target, spellProto, spellProto->SchoolMask);
6764  // no SpellDamageBonus for burn mana
6765  caster->CalculateSpellDamageTaken(&damageInfo, int32(gain * dmgMultiplier), spellProto);
6766 
6767  Unit::DealDamageMods(damageInfo.target, damageInfo.damage, &damageInfo.absorb);
6768 
6769  caster->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&damageInfo);
6770 
6771  // Set trigger flag
6772  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DONE_PERIODIC;
6773  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_PERIODIC;
6774  uint32 procEx = createProcExtendMask(&damageInfo, SPELL_MISS_NONE) | PROC_EX_INTERNAL_DOT;
6775  if (damageInfo.damage)
6776  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE;
6777 
6778  caster->DealSpellDamage(&damageInfo, true);
6779 
6780  DamageInfo dmgInfo(damageInfo, DOT);
6781  caster->ProcDamageAndSpell(damageInfo.target, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, damageInfo.damage, BASE_ATTACK, spellProto, nullptr, GetEffIndex(), nullptr, &dmgInfo);
6782 }
6783 
6784 void AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerSpellAuraProc(AuraApplication* aurApp, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
6785 {
6786  Unit* triggerCaster = aurApp->GetTarget();
6787  Unit* triggerTarget = eventInfo.GetProcTarget();
6788 
6789  uint32 triggerSpellId = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].TriggerSpell;
6790  if (SpellInfo const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggerSpellId))
6791  {
6792  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerSpellAuraProc: Triggering spell %u from aura %u proc", triggeredSpellInfo->Id, GetId());
6793  triggerCaster->CastSpell(triggerTarget, triggeredSpellInfo, true, nullptr, this);
6794  }
6795  else
6796  {
6797  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerSpellAuraProc: Could not trigger spell %u from aura %u proc, because the spell does not have an entry in Spell.dbc.", triggerSpellId, GetId());
6798  }
6799 }
6800 
6801 void AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerSpellWithValueAuraProc(AuraApplication* aurApp, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
6802 {
6803  Unit* triggerCaster = aurApp->GetTarget();
6804  Unit* triggerTarget = eventInfo.GetProcTarget();
6805 
6806  uint32 triggerSpellId = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[m_effIndex].TriggerSpell;
6807  if (SpellInfo const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggerSpellId))
6808  {
6809  // used only with EXTRA_LOGS
6810  (void)triggeredSpellInfo;
6811 
6812  int32 basepoints0 = GetAmount();
6813  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerSpellWithValueAuraProc: Triggering spell %u with value %d from aura %u proc", triggeredSpellInfo->Id, basepoints0, GetId());
6814  triggerCaster->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, triggerSpellId, &basepoints0, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this);
6815  }
6816  else
6817  {
6818  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerSpellWithValueAuraProc: Could not trigger spell %u from aura %u proc, because the spell does not have an entry in Spell.dbc.", triggerSpellId, GetId());
6819  }
6820 }
6821 
6822 void AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerDamageAuraProc(AuraApplication* aurApp, ProcEventInfo& eventInfo)
6823 {
6824  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
6825  Unit* triggerTarget = eventInfo.GetProcTarget();
6826  if (triggerTarget->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ISOLATED) || triggerTarget->IsImmunedToDamageOrSchool(GetSpellInfo()))
6827  {
6828  SendTickImmune(triggerTarget, target);
6829  return;
6830  }
6831 
6832  SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(target, triggerTarget, GetSpellInfo(), GetSpellInfo()->SchoolMask);
6833  uint32 damage = target->SpellDamageBonusDone(triggerTarget, GetSpellInfo(), GetAmount(), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
6834  damage = triggerTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(target, GetSpellInfo(), damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
6835  target->CalculateSpellDamageTaken(&damageInfo, damage, GetSpellInfo());
6836  Unit::DealDamageMods(damageInfo.target, damageInfo.damage, &damageInfo.absorb);
6837  target->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&damageInfo);
6838  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleProcTriggerDamageAuraProc: Triggering %u spell damage from aura %u proc", damage, GetId());
6839  target->DealSpellDamage(&damageInfo, true);
6840 }
6841 
6842 void AuraEffect::HandleRaidProcFromChargeAuraProc(AuraApplication* aurApp, ProcEventInfo& /*eventInfo*/)
6843 {
6844  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
6845 
6846  uint32 triggerSpellId;
6847  switch (GetId())
6848  {
6849  case 57949: // Shiver
6850  triggerSpellId = 57952;
6851  //animationSpellId = 57951; dummy effects for jump spell have unknown use (see also 41637)
6852  break;
6853  case 59978: // Shiver
6854  triggerSpellId = 59979;
6855  break;
6856  case 43593: // Cold Stare
6857  triggerSpellId = 43594;
6858  break;
6859  default:
6860  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleRaidProcFromChargeAuraProc: received not handled spell: %u", GetId());
6861  return;
6862  }
6863 
6864  int32 jumps = GetBase()->GetCharges();
6865 
6866  // current aura expire on proc finish
6867  GetBase()->SetCharges(0);
6868  GetBase()->SetUsingCharges(true);
6869 
6870  // next target selection
6871  if (jumps > 0)
6872  {
6873  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
6874  {
6875  float radius = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].CalcRadius(caster);
6876 
6877  if (Unit* triggerTarget = target->GetNextRandomRaidMemberOrPet(radius))
6878  {
6879  target->CastSpell(triggerTarget, GetSpellInfo(), true, nullptr, this, GetCasterGUID());
6880  if (Aura* aura = triggerTarget->GetAura(GetId(), GetCasterGUID()))
6881  aura->SetCharges(jumps);
6882  }
6883  }
6884  }
6885 
6886  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleRaidProcFromChargeAuraProc: Triggering spell %u from aura %u proc", triggerSpellId, GetId());
6887  target->CastSpell(target, triggerSpellId, true, nullptr, this, GetCasterGUID());
6888 }
6889 
6890 void AuraEffect::HandleRaidProcFromChargeWithValueAuraProc(AuraApplication* aurApp, ProcEventInfo& /*eventInfo*/)
6891 {
6892  Unit* target = aurApp->GetTarget();
6893 
6894  // Currently only Prayer of Mending
6895  if (!(GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST && GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x20))
6896  {
6897  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleRaidProcFromChargeWithValueAuraProc: received not handled spell: %u", GetId());
6898  return;
6899  }
6900  uint32 triggerSpellId = 33110;
6901 
6902  int32 value = GetAmount();
6903 
6904  int32 jumps = GetBase()->GetCharges();
6905 
6906  // current aura expire on proc finish
6907  GetBase()->SetCharges(0);
6908  GetBase()->SetUsingCharges(true);
6909 
6910  // next target selection
6911  if (jumps > 0)
6912  {
6913  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
6914  {
6915  float radius = GetSpellInfo()->Effects[GetEffIndex()].CalcRadius(caster);
6916 
6917  Unit* triggerTarget = nullptr;
6918  Acore::MostHPMissingGroupInRange u_check(target, radius, 0);
6919  Acore::UnitLastSearcher<Acore::MostHPMissingGroupInRange> searcher(target, triggerTarget, u_check);
6920  Cell::VisitAllObjects(target, searcher, radius);
6921 
6922  if (triggerTarget)
6923  {
6924  target->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, GetId(), &value, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this, GetCasterGUID());
6925  if (Aura* aura = triggerTarget->GetAura(GetId(), GetCasterGUID()))
6926  aura->SetCharges(jumps);
6927  }
6928  }
6929  }
6930 
6931  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "AuraEffect::HandleRaidProcFromChargeWithValueAuraProc: Triggering spell %u from aura %u proc", triggerSpellId, GetId());
6932  target->CastCustomSpell(target, triggerSpellId, &value, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, this, GetCasterGUID());
6933 }
